рж╕ржлржЯржУржпрж╝рзНржпрж╛рж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ 'ржЖржжрзБ ржнрж╛ржЗ' ржмрж▓рждрзЗ ржпрж╛ ржмрзЛржЭрж╛ржпрж╝, ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ржЯрж╛ржЗ рждрж╛ржЗред ржкрзБрж░ржирзЛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржЧрзНрж░рзЛрже ржирзЗржЗред ржХрж╛рж░ржг, 'ржЖржжрзБ ржнрж╛ржЗ'рж░рж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржорж╛ржерж╛ржпрж╝ ржмрж╕рзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржбрж┐рж░рзЗржХрзНржЯрж░ ржмрж╛ржирж╛ржирзЛ рж╣ржпрж╝рзЗржЫрзЗ ржарж┐ржХржЗ, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржПрж░рж╛ ржПржХрзЗржХржЯрж╛ ржПржХрзЗржмрж╛рж░рзЗ ржЕржЪрж▓ ржорж╛рж▓ред ржЧрзНрж░рж╛ржорзЗ ржпрзЗржоржи ржЬржорж┐рж░ рж╕рзАржорж╛ржирж╛ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ рж▓рзЛржХржЬржи ржорж╛рж░рж╛ржорж╛рж░рж┐ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗржУ ржбрж┐рж░рзЗржХрзНржЯрж░рж░рж╛ рждрзЗржоржи рждрзБржЪрзНржЫ ржмрж┐рж╖ржпрж╝ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржПржХрзЗ ржЕржкрж░рзЗрж░ рж╕ржЩрзНржЧрзЗ рж▓рзЗржЧрзЗ ржерж╛ржХрзЗредржПрж░рж╛ ржПржд ржЪрж╛ржк ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЪрж▓рзЗ, ржоржирзЗ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржкрзНрж░рж╕ржм ржмрзЗржжржирж╛ ржЙржарзЗржЫрзЗред ржЖрж░ ржПржЗ ржмрзЗржжржирж╛ рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ ржЙржкрж░ ржЪрж╛ржкрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржпрж╝ред
ржЖржкржирж┐ ржпржжрж┐ рж▓ржпрж╝рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж┐ржЯрж┐ ржжрзЗржЦрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржжрзАрж░рзНржШржжрж┐ржи ржПржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗржи, ржжрзЗржЦржмрзЗржи ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ ржмрж╛ржбрж╝ржЫрзЗ ржирж╛ред ржЙрж▓рзНржЯрзЛ ржмрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржХржо ржПржХрзНрж╕ржкрзЗрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржирзНрж╕ржб ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ ржПржирзЗ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржмрзЗрждржи ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржмрж╕рж╛ржмрзЗред ржжрж┐ржи-рж░рж╛ржд ржХрзЛржи ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржмрзБржЭрзЗ ржирж╛, рж╕ржмрж╕ржоржпрж╝ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржХрж╛ржЫ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржЪрж╛ржЗржмрзЗред ржХржЦржи ржлрзЛржи ржжрзЗржмрзЗ рждрж╛рж░ ржарж┐ржХ ржирзЗржЗред
ржЖрж░ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐? ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржЪрж╛ржУржпрж╝рж╛ ржпрзЗржи ржПржХ ржзрж░ржирзЗрж░ ржЕржкрж░рж╛ржз! ржоржирзЗ рж╣ржмрзЗ ржЖржкржирж┐ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржмржЙржХрзЗ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржкрж╛рж▓рж╛рждрзЗ ржЪрзЗржпрж╝рзЗржЫрзЗржиред ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬрж╛рж░ ржкржжржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗрж░ рж▓рзЛржХ ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржнрж░рзЗ ржлрзЗрж▓рзЗржЫрзЗтАФржпрзЛржЧрзНржпрждрж╛ ржиржпрж╝, ржЖрждрзНржорзАржпрж╝рждрж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗржЗ ржЪрж▓ржмрзЗред ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржЖрждрзНржорзАржпрж╝-рж╕рзНржмржЬржирж░рж╛ржУ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржЪрзЗржпрж╝рзЗ ржЕржХрж╛ржЬ ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржХрж░рзЗред ржПржХрзЗржХржЬржи рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржирждрзБржи ржирждрзБржи ржХрзМрж╢рж▓ ржмрзЗрж░ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржпрзЗржи ржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржХрзЗ ржирж┐ржЪрзЗ ржирж╛ржорж╛рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗред
ржПржЗ ржмрзБржбрж╝рзЛ-ржзрж╛ржоржбрж╝рж╛ ржбрж┐рж░рзЗржХрзНржЯрж░рж░рж╛ ржПржХржжрж┐ржХрзЗ ржорж╛рж▓рзНржЯрж┐ржирзНржпрж╛рж╢ржирж╛рж▓ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржкрзНрж░ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржУржЗрж╕ржм ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржарж┐ржХржорждрзЛ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржЖржирждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржирж╛ред ржУржжрзЗрж░ ржПржХржЯрж╛ржЗ ржХрж╛ржЬтАФржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓ржпрж╝рж┐ржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ ржХржорж╛ржирзЛ ржпрж╛ржпрж╝редржПрж░рж╛ ржПржоржи ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐, рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ ржирж╛ ржмрж╛ржбрж╝рж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ рж╕рж╛ржоржирзЗрж░ ржмржЫрж░ ржжрзЗржмрзЗ ржмрж▓рзЗ ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржжрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржорзБрж▓рж╛ ржЭрзБрж▓рж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрзЗред ржПрждржжрж┐ржи ржЧрж╛ржзрж╛рж░ ржорждрзЛ ржЦрзЗржЯрзЗржУ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ржХрзЗ ржмржбрж╝ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рж▓ ржирж╛, ржЕржержЪ ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржЪрзЗржпрж╝рзЗ ржЫрзЛржЯ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржмрж╛ржЬрж╛рж░рзЗ ржПрж╕рзЗ ржЖржЬ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржмржбрж╝ рж╣ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗред

title: ржПржХржЬржи ржкрзНрж░рзЛржЧрж╛ржорж┐ржВржкрзНрж░рзЗржорзА ржмрзНржпржХрзНрждрж┐ржХрзЗ ржкрзНрж░рзЛржЧрзНрж░рж╛ржорж┐ржВ ржлрзЛржмрж┐рзЯрж╛ ржмрж╛ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржи
content:
ржорж╣рж╛ржЦрж╛рж▓рзА DOHS ржПрж░ рззрзн ржиржВ рж░рзЛржбрзЗ ржЕржмрж╕рзНржерж┐ржд ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ржжрзЗрж╢рзЗрж░ рж╕ржмржЪрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржнржирзНржб ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржПржЯрж╛ред рзй ржЬрзБрж▓рж╛ржЗ рзирзжрзирзк, ржП ржПржЗ ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржи ржлрзНрж▓рж╛ржЯрж╛рж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ рж╣рж┐рж╕рзЗржмрзЗ ржЬрзЯрзЗржи ржХрж░рж┐ред ржЬрзЯрзЗржи ржХрж░рж╛рж░ рж╕ржорзЯ ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржлрзНрж▓рж╛ржЯрж╛рж░рзЗ ржПржХржЬржи рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░, ржПржХржЬржи ржорж┐ржб ржУ ржПржХржЬржи ржЬрзБржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ ржерж╛ржХрж╛рж░ ржХржерж╛ред ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржЖржорж░рж╛ ржорж╛рждрзНрж░ рзл ржЬржи ржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржо ржпрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ рзк ржЬржи ржЗ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржиред
ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржирзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж░ рж╕ржорзЯ ржмрж▓рж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ рж╕рж┐ржЗржУ (ржЖрж░ржорж╛ржи) ржЙржирж┐ ржирж╛ржХрж┐ ржорж╛ржЗржХрзНрж░рзЛрж╕ржлржЯ ржП ржЬржм ржХрж░рзЗржЫрзЗржи, ржЕрж╕рзНржЯрзНрж░рзЗрж▓рж┐рзЯрж╛рзЯ ржорж╛рж╕рзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНрж╕ ржХрж░рзЗржЫрзЗржи, ржЙржирж┐ ржирж╛ржХрж┐ ржмрж┐рж╕рж┐ржПрж╕ ржХрзНржпрж╛ржбрж╛рж░ ржУ ржЫрж┐рж▓рзЗржиред
ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржиржЯрж┐ ржЫрж┐рж▓рзЛ рждрж╛рж░ ржмрж╛рж╕рж╛рж░ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржЕржВрж╢ ржпрж╛ ржЖржорж┐ ржХрзЯрзЗржХржжрж┐ржи ржкрж░ ржмрзБржЭрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рж┐ред ржЦрж╛ржмрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржлрзНржпрж╛рж╕рж┐рж▓рж┐ржЯрж┐ ржмрж▓рждрзЗ рж╕ржХрж╛рж▓рзЗ ржЖржорж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзБржЗржЯрж╛ рж╕рж┐ржВржЧрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЖржирж╛ржЗрждрзЛ ржУржЯрж╛ржЗред
ржПржХржЯрзБ ржкрж░ ржкрж░ ржПрж╕рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржЖржкржбрзЗржЯ ржЪрж╛ржЗрждрзЗржиред ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрж┐рж╖рзНржЯ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж▓рж╛ржи ржЫрж┐рж▓рзЛ ржирж╛ред рзз ржШржирзНржЯрж╛ ржкрж░ ржкрж░ ржПрж╕рзЗ ржПржЯрж╛ ржХрж░ржЫрж┐ ржХрж┐ржирж╛ред ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХржо ржЖржЧрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЛ ржХрзЗржи рж╣рзЗржи рждрзЗржи ржПржоржи ржЕржирзЗржХ ржкрзНрж░рзЗрж╢рж╛рж░ ржжрж┐рждрзЛред ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯ рждрж╛рж░ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗржЗ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗ ржжрж┐рждрзЛ ржЖржорж╛ржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржПржмржВ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗржЗ ржШрзБржорж╛рждрж╛ржо ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржкрж░рзЗрж░ ржжрж┐ржи рж╕ржХрж╛рж▓рзЗ ржЙржарзЗ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ред ржЖржорж┐ ржнрж╛ржмрждрж╛ржо ржПржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ рж╣рзЯрждрзЛ рж▓рж╛рж░рзНржирж┐ржВ ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзЗрж╕ред (ржпржжрж┐ржУ ржЖржорж╛рж░ ржЕржирзНржпрж╛ржирзНржп ржмржирзНржзрзБрж░рж╛ ржПрждрзЗ ржПржХржЯрзБржУ рж╕рж╛рзЯ ржжрж┐ржд ржирж╛)
ржЖржорж┐ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛржЗ ржбрзЗржбрж┐ржХрзЗрж╢ржи ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржХрж░рждрж╛ржо ржмрж▓рзЗ ржХржЦржирзЛ рждрж╛рж░ ржЧрж╛рж▓рж╛ржЧрж╛рж▓рж┐ ржЦрж╛ржЗ ржирж┐ рждржмрзЗ ржЕржирзНржп ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржирзНржжрзЗрж░ ржЦрж╛рж╢ ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛ ржнрж╛рж╖рж╛рзЯ ржЧрж╛рж▓рж╛ржЧрж╛рж▓рж┐ ржжрж┐рждрзЛ (ржмрж╛рж▓, ржЪрзЛ*ржЗрждрзЗ ржЖрж╕ржЫрж┐рж╕ ржПржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржЫрж┐рж▓рзЛ рждрж╛рж░ ржХржоржи ржнрж╛рж╖рж╛, ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯ ржорж╛рж░рждрзЗ ржЖрж╕рж╛рж░ ржерзНрж░рзЗржб ржжрж┐рждрзЛ)ред
рждрж╛рж░ рж╕рж┐ржЧрж╛рж░рзЗржЯ ржЦрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржмрж╛ржЬрзЗ ржЕржнрзНржпрж╛рж╕ред ржЖржорж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯ рж╕рж┐ржЧрж╛рж░рзЗржЯ ржЖржирж╛ржЗрждрзЛ ржЖрж░ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗржЗ рж╕рж┐ржЧрж╛рж░рзЗржЯ ржЦрж╛ржЗрждрзЛ ржпрзЗржЯрж╛┬а ржПржХржЯрзБржУ ржорж╛ржирж╛ржирж╕ржЗ ржирж╛ред

title: Worst than a garments Factory
content:
This is the worst company you can ever imagine for software engineers. All the team leads are 20 years behind the times, yet they act like they know everything. They come to the office late every day. The QA team lead is the worst among all the leads. She literally knows nothing about QA but constantly shouts and argues with her QA team members as well as with developers. Her behavior is like sheтАЩs the master of the world and everyone else is her slave. She has serious behavioral issues.
YouтАЩll feel like vomiting when you go to the washroomтАФitтАЩs that bad.
The CEO pretends to be a good person in public, but behind the scenes, he doesnтАЩt follow anything he preaches. He will cut your Saturday holiday if a government holiday falls on a Thursday or Sunday.
The database team includes a fat guy who reports any Glassdoor posts about the company to the team lead just to look good in front of them. The culture between teams is the most toxic you can imagine.
ThereтАЩs no salary increment after one year, even though during joining they promise it both verbally and in the offer letter. In reality, you wonтАЩt get any raise even after 1.5 to 1.6 years.

title: If you really are a tel mara public please Go there , They are waiting for you
content:
-- Office Politics overloaded.-- Office time 10-6pm. kintu apni 8 tar dik office theke ber hole o mone hobe jibon er sob theke boro vul kore felechen.-- Salary Structure Bad. and Prottekmas e Delay hobe. majhe majhe mas skip o hote pare.-- Project unrealistic Timeline.-- HR is unproffessional.-- Even no surity to get a device for your work.-- No scope for learing only kamla diba valo thakba otherwise eta tmr jonno nah.

title: weDevs: Where тАШBlame the KamlaтАЩ is a Feature, Not a Bug
content: After working at five companies, I can say with pride:┬аweDevs is the best. Yeah, itтАЩs got some toxicity. Managers get too much blind trust. The "kamlas" take all the blame. But when I stack it up against every other company in BD?┬аweDevs stands tall.

title: The most overhyped software company in Bangladesh
content: The company does next-level marketing by showing off secondary things.Pros :- Amazing interior with a friendly environment.- Food is good- Worktime flexibility- Salary on timeCons:- You have to oil most of the seniors and management to get into their good books.- They have a negative mindset towards most people who have beards and follow religion deeply. (If you are a secular or an atheist, you can be their light bearer.)- Once you are in their bad book, it doesn't matter anymore whether you make great efforts or not; you will never get fairly evaluated.- Poor, old projects: 90% of projects are not structured and not managed well. (You may have to work without a design and then change the whole thing 3-4 times based on changes just because they didn't like it, so why not provide requirements and design in the first place?).- Sometimes some toxic seniors may threaten you indirectly regarding your job.- Some people will get higher increment just by talking bullshits they have done about which they don't even know- Huge salary imbalance despite having the same joining date and performance, with a poor entry-level salary if you are not from SUST or IUT.They will tell you about the pool table, table tennis , 27th floor, and all, but internal politics will make you feel demotivated as an engineer and as a human being.

title: рж╢рзБрж░рзБрж░ ржорж┐рж╖рзНржЯрж┐ ржХржерж╛, ржкрж░рзЗ ржХрзЗржмрж▓ ржХрж╖рзНржЯ тАУ Mysoftheaven (BD) Ltd.-ржП ржЖржорж╛рж░ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЬрзАржмржирзЗрж░ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржХрж╖рзНржЯржХрж░ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛
content:
ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЦрзБржБржЬржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржо ржЕржирзЗржХ ржжрж┐ржиред рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржПржХржжрж┐ржи ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржкрзЛрж╕рзНржЯрзЗ ржЪрзЛржЦ ржкрзЬрж▓рзЛ тАФMysoftheaven (BD) Ltd.ржирж╛ржорзЗрж░ ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ рж╕ржлржЯржУрзЯрзНржпрж╛рж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржЪрзНржЫрзЗред ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржХрж▓ ржПрж▓рзЛ, ржЧрзЗрж▓рж╛ржоредрж╕рзЗржжрж┐ржи ржпрж┐ржирж┐ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рзЗржи (ржпрж╛рж░ ржирж╛ржо ржПржЦржи ржмрж▓рждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржЗ ржирж╛), ржПржоржиржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рзЗржи ржпрзЗржи ржЖржорж┐ржЗ ржмрзБржЭрж┐ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржнржмрж┐рж╖рзНржпрзО! ржмрж▓рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рзЗржи, тАЬржЖржорж░рж╛ ржЯрзНржпрж╛рж▓рзЗржирзНржЯ ржЦрзБржБржЬрж┐, ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрж╛рж░, ржЖржкржирж┐ ржЖрж╕рж▓рзЗржЗ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи ржкрж╛ржмрзЗржиредтАЭ
ржЖржорж┐ ржмрж┐рж╢рзНржмрж╛рж╕ ржХрж░рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржоред
ржкрзНрж░ржержо ржХрзЯрзЗржХржжрж┐ржи рж╕ржмржХрж┐ржЫрзБржЗ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ рж▓рж╛ржЧрж▓рзЛ тАФ рж╕рж╣ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░рж╛ ржорзЛржЯрж╛ржорзБржЯрж┐ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ, ржЯрж┐ржо ржУрзЯрж╛рж░рзНржХржУ ржоржирзНржж ржирж╛ред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ рждрж╛рж░ржкрж░ рж╢рзБрж░рзБ рж╣рж▓рзЛ ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрждрж╛ред
ржорж╛рж╕ рж╢рзЗрж╖рзЗ рж╕ржмрж╛рж░ ржоржд ржЖржорж┐ржУ ржЖрж╢рж╛ ржХрж░рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржо ржирж┐рж░рзНржзрж╛рж░рж┐ржд рждрж╛рж░рж┐ржЦрзЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржкрж╛ржмред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржкрзЗрж▓рж╛ржо ржирж╛ред HR ржмрж▓рж▓, тАЬржПржЗ ржорж╛рж╕ ржПржХржЯрзБ ржжрзЗрж░рж┐ рж╣ржмрзЗредтАЭ ржкрж░рзЗрж░ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗржУ рждрж╛ржЗред ржПржХржмрж╛рж░ рждрзЛ ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржорж╛рж╕ рж╢рзЗрж╖ рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗ, рзирзл рждрж╛рж░рж┐ржЦрзЗ ржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрж┐ тАФ ржПржЦржирзЛ рж╣рж┐рж╕рж╛ржм рж╣рзЯржирж┐ред ржЕржержЪ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржи рзпржЯрж╛рж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржврзБржХрждрзЗржЗ рж╣ржмрзЗ тАФ рж▓рзЗржЯ рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржХрж╛ржЯрж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ, ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржорзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржорзВрж▓рзНржп ржирзЗржЗред
ржПржХржжрж┐ржи рж╕ржирзНржзрзНржпрж╛ рзмржЯрж╛ рззрзл-рзирзж ржмрж╛ржЬрзЗ, ржЖржорж░рж╛ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржкрзНрж░рж╛рзЯ ржмрзЗрж░ рж╣ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзНрждрзБрждрж┐ ржирж┐ржЪрзНржЫрж┐ тАФ рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржПржоржбрж┐ рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржм ржмрж▓рзЗ ржЙржарж▓рзЗржи, тАЬрж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржирж┐ржЪрзЗ ржХржиржлрж╛рж░рзЗржирзНрж╕ рж░рзБржорзЗ ржЖрж╕рзЗржи, ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржЬрж░рзБрж░рж┐ ржорж┐ржЯрж┐ржВ ржЖржЫрзЗредтАЭржЖржорж┐ ржнрж╛ржмрж▓рж╛ржо рж╣рзЯрждрзЛ рззрзж-рззрзл ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯ рж╣ржмрзЗ, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ ржЧрзЬрж╛рж▓ рж░рж╛ржд рззрзжржЯрж╛ ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНрждред ржПржоржи ржЕржирзЗржХ ржжрж┐ржи ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗтАФрж░рж╛ржд рззрззржЯрж╛рзЯ ржмрж╛рж╕рзЗ ржЙржарзЗржЫрж┐, ржЦрж╛рж▓рж┐ рж░рж╛рж╕рзНрждрж╛рзЯ ржХрзНрж▓рж╛ржирзНржд рж╢рж░рзАрж░ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржмрж╛рзЬрж┐ ржлрж┐рж░рзЗржЫрж┐ред ржкрж░ржжрж┐ржи ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржарж┐ржХ рзпржЯрж╛рзЯ рж░рж┐ржкрзЛрж░рзНржЯрж┐ржВред
ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрж╛рж▓ржХ ржкржжрзЗ ржерж╛ржХрж╛ ржПржХржЬржи ржорж╣рж┐рж▓рж╛ (ржпрж┐ржирж┐ ржПржоржбрж┐рж░ рж╕рзНрждрзНрж░рзА), рждрж╛рж░ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржЫрж┐рж▓ ржПржХрзЗржмрж╛рж░рзЗ ржЕржкржорж╛ржиржЬржиржХред ржХрзЛржирзЛржжрж┐ржи рж╢рж╛рж▓рзАржиржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рзЗржиржирж┐ред ржПржХржмрж╛рж░ ржЕрж╕рзБрж╕рзНрже рж╣рзЯрзЗ рзз ржжрж┐ржи ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржорж┐рж╕ ржХрж░рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржо, ржлрзЛржи ржХрж░рзЗржУ ржЬрж╛ржирж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржоред ржкрж░ржжрж┐ржи ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржПрж╕рзЗ рж╢рзБржирж┐, тАЬрждрзБржорж┐ рждрзЛ рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржЧрж╛рзЯрзЗржм рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржЧрзЗрж▓рзЗ!тАЭ ржмрж▓рзЗ ржпрзЗ ржПржЗржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржХрж░рзЗ рж▓рж┐ржн ржирзЗржУрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛ржмрзЗ ржирж╛ред ржХрж┐ ржЖржЬржм ржЕрж╕рзБрж╕рзНрже рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ ржмрзБржЭрж┐ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржирзЗржУрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛ржмрзЗ ржирж╛??тАЭ
ржПржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХрждржжрж┐ржи ржЪрж▓ржмрзЗ? ржПржХрж╕ржорзЯ ржмрзБржЭрж▓рж╛ржо, ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржерж╛ржХрж▓рзЗ рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржЖрждрзНржорж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи рж╣рж╛рж░рж╛ржмрзЛ, ржЖрж░ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржирж╛ред рждрж╛ржЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ржЯрж╛ ржЫрзЗрзЬрзЗ ржжрзЗржЗредржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржирждрзБржи ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржпрзЛржЧ ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржЗржЫрзЗржи, рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржЙржжрзНржжрзЗрж╢рзЗ ржмрж▓рж┐ тАФрж╢рзБржзрзБ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржкрзЗрж▓рзЗржЗ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛, ржПржХржЯрж╛ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржиржЬржиржХ ржУ рж╕рзБрж╖рзНржарзБ ржХрж░рзНржоржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ржУ ржЬрж░рзБрж░рж┐ред

title: Cancer in the name of software compny
content: Whenever you hear the name of this company just run away from there .The company has no goal , no salary , no acievement.The CEO so called multi millionaire , ex buetian , ex NASA engineer , ex Lockhead martin engineer is┬а nothing but self claimed entrepreneur .The guy has no ethics .he will shout at all employee over meetings.The HR and accounts has no idea why they are in the company.Software team has no life. They have to work from 7 pm to 5 am continous . without getting paid for months after month . When you ask for salary the CEO will blame you for not delivering projects.The CEO will give you tasks of 1 month and expects you to finish within a day .one word for this company ,,,, JUST RUN

content:
рждрж┐ржирж┐ рж╢рзБржзрзБ CIO ржиржи, ржкрзНрж░ржпрзБржХрзНрждрж┐рж░ ржЕржмрждрж╛рж░! рждрж╛рж░ ржХржерж╛ржмрж╛рж░рзНрждрж╛рзЯ ржерж╛ржХрзЗ ржРрж╢рзА ржмрж╛рж░рзНрждрж╛ тАФ"ржЖржорж┐ ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржХрж╛ржЙрж░рзЗ рж╢рзЗржЦрж╛ржЗрждрзЗ ржЖржЗ ржирж╛ржЗ рж░рзЗ ржмрж╛ржмрж╛!"рждрж╛ржБрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рж╛рж░ ржЕржирзБржорждрж┐ рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржирж┐рж░рзНржмрж╛ржЪрж┐ржд ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ тАЬржмрж┐рж╢рзЗрж╖тАЭ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖рзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржмрж░рж╛ржжрзНржжред ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржпрзЗржи рждрзБржЪрзНржЫ ржЬржиржЧржгредржЖрж░ ржпрж┐ржирж┐ рждрж╛ржБрж░ ржкрзНрж░рж┐рзЯ рж▓рзЛржХ тАФ рждрж┐ржирж┐ржЗ ржмрж╕рзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗржи ржПржоржи ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ ржкржЬрж┐рж╢ржирзЗ ржпрж╛рж░ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржирзНржпрзВржирждржо ржЖржЗржбрж┐рзЯрж╛ржУ рждрж╛ржБрж░ ржирзЗржЗред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ рждрж╛рждрзЗ ржХрзА? тАШржнржХрзНрждрж┐тАЩржЗ ржпрзЗ ржорзВрж▓ ржпрзЛржЧрзНржпрждрж╛!
рждрж┐ржирж┐ рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржкрзНрж░ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬрж╛рж░ ржиржи тАФ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзЗ ржнрж╛ржмрзЗржи ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржорж╛рж▓рж┐ржХ, ржЖржмрж╛рж░ рж╕рзЗржЗ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЧрзБржЧрж▓рзЗрж░ ржнржмрж┐рж╖рзНржпрзО рж╕рзНржержкрждрж┐редрждрж╛рж░ ржЪрзЗрж╖рзНржЯрж╛ ржПржоржи, ржпрзЗржи ржПржХржжрж┐ржирзЗржЗ ржЧрзБржЧрж▓ржХрзЗ ржирждрзБржи ржХрж░рзЗ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржк ржХрж░ржмрзЗржиред ржХржЦржирзЛ ржнрж╛ржмрж┐, ржЧрзБржЧрж▓ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ рждрзЛ ржПрждрзЛ ржмрзЬ ржЯрзНржпрж╛рж▓рзЗржирзНржЯ ржврж╛ржХрж╛ ржмржирж╛ржирзАрждрзЗ ржмрж╕рзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗ?рждрж╛рж░ рж╕рж┐ржжрзНржзрж╛ржирзНржд ржорж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржЪрзВрзЬрж╛ржирзНрждред ржЖрж░ ржмрзНржпрж╕рзНрждрждрж╛рж░ рждрзЛ рж╕рзАржорж╛ ржирзЗржЗ тАФ ржпржжрж┐ржУ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржЪрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржорж┐ржЯрж┐ржВ ржЖрж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛рждрзЗржЗ ржХрж╛ржЯрзЗ рж╕ржорзЯред
ржПржЗ ржЪрж░рж┐рждрзНрж░ржЯрж┐ ржпрзЗржи рж░рж╛ржЬржирзАрждрж┐рж░ ржоржЮрзНржЪрзЗрж░ ржШрзЛрж╖ржХред ржарж┐ржХ ржпрзЗржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржирзЗрждрж╛ ржнрж╛рж╖ржг ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЖржЧрзЗ ржПржХржЬржи рждрж╛ржБржХрзЗ ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрзЯ ржХрж░рж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗрзЯ, рждрж┐ржирж┐ржУ рждрж╛ржЗ ржХрж░рзЗржи ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗредржЙржирж┐ ржХрзЛржерж╛рзЯ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗржи ржмрзЛржЭрж╛ ржХржарж┐ржи тАФ ржПржХржмрж╛рж░ ржоржирзЗ рж╣рзЯ HR, ржПржХржмрж╛рж░ Admin, ржЖрж░рзЗржХржмрж╛рж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕ржлржЯржУрзЯрзНржпрж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░ржХрж▓рзНржкрзЗред рж╕ржмржЬрж╛ржирзНрждрж╛ ржирж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ рж╕ржм ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржмрж▓рж╛рж░ ржЕржзрж┐ржХрж╛рж░ рж░рж╛ржЦрзЗржиред
ржирзЗржЯржУрзЯрж╛рж░рзНржХ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржи ржкрзНржпрж╛ржХрзЗржЯ рж╣рж╛рж░рж╛рзЯредржЕржжрзНржнрзБрждржнрж╛ржмрзЗ, рждрж╛ржБрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржжрзЛрж╖ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ тАФ ржХрж╛рж░ржг рждрж┐ржирж┐ рж╕рзЗржЗ ржкрзНрж░ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржнрж╛ржЗ, ржпрж┐ржирж┐ ржЖржмрж╛рж░ CIO-рж░ ржкрзНрж░рж┐рзЯрждржоредржЕрж░рзНржерж╛рзО, ржЯрзНржпрж╛рж▓рзЗржирзНржЯ ржирзЯ, рж╕ржорзНржкрж░рзНржХржЗ ржЖрж╕рж▓ред
ржПржЗ ржмрж┐ржнрж╛ржЧрзЗрж░ ржХрж░рзНрждрж╛ ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзЗ рж╢рзБржзрзБржорж╛рждрзНрж░ рж╕рж┐ржХрж┐ржЙрж░рж┐ржЯрж┐ ржПржХрзНрж╕ржкрж╛рж░рзНржЯ ржнрж╛ржмрзЗржи ржирж╛, ржмрж░ржВ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзЗ ржПржХржЬржи ржкрзВрж░рзНржгрж╛ржЩрзНржЧ рж╕ржлржЯржУрзЯрзНржпрж╛рж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ ржоржирзЗ ржХрж░рзЗржиредрждрж╛ржБрж░ ржжрзГрж╖рзНржЯрж┐рждрзЗ рж╕рж╛ржЗржмрж╛рж░ рж╕рж┐ржХрж┐ржЙрж░рж┐ржЯрж┐ рж╣рж▓рзЛ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржлрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░ ржХрзЛржб ржХрж░рзЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ред ржкрж▓рж┐рж╕рж┐, ржПржирж╛рж▓рж╛ржЗрж╕рж┐рж╕, ржерзНрж░рзЗржЯ ржбрж┐ржЯрзЗржХрж╢ржи ржПрж╕ржм тАЬрждрж╛рждрзНрждрзНржмрж┐ржХтАЭ ржЬрж┐ржирж┐рж╕ред
ржмрзЗрждржи ржХржЦржи рж╣ржмрзЗ ржХрзЗржЙ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ ржирж╛ тАФржорж╛рж╕ рж╢рзЗрж╖рзЗ ржЯрзЗржирж╢ржи, ржорж╛ржЭрж╛ржорж╛ржЭрж┐ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗржУ ржмрзЗрждржи ржЖрж╕рзЗ ржирж╛ ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯредржпрзЛржЧрзНржпрждрж╛ ржирзЯ, рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБ ржнрж╛ржЗ ржХрж╛рж▓ржЪрж╛рж░ржЗ рж░рж╛ржЬрждрзНржм ржХрж░рзЗ тАФрж╕рждрзНржпрж┐ ржмрж▓рж▓рзЗ, ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпрж╛рзЯржи ржирзЗржЗ, ржмрж░ржВ ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЦрзБрж╢рж┐ рж░рж╛ржЦрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ржЗ ржПржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛рзЯредржкрзБрж░ржирзЛ ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░рж╛ ржЕржмрж╣рзЗрж▓рж┐ржд тАФржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржмржЫрж░рзЗрж░ ржкрж░ ржмржЫрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░ржЫрзЗ, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржнрзБрж▓рзЗ ржпрж╛рзЯ, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржирждрзБржиржжрзЗрж░ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржорж╛рждрж╛ржорж╛рждрж┐редржирзАрждрж┐ржорж╛рж▓рж╛ ржирзЗржЗ, рж╕рзНржмрзЗржЪрзНржЫрж╛ржЪрж╛рж░рж┐рждрж╛ ржЪрж▓рзЗ тАФрж▓рж┐ржЦрж┐ржд ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржирж┐рзЯржо ржирзЗржЗ, ржпрзЗржЯрж╛ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯрзЗрж░ рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛, рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ржЗ ржирж┐рзЯржо ржмрж▓рзЗ ржЪрж╛ржкрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯредржЧрж╕рж┐ржк ржЖрж░ ржирзЗрждрж┐ржмрж╛ржЪржХрждрж╛ тАФржнржжрзНрж░рждрж╛, рж╢рзНрж░ржжрзНржзрж╛, ржкрзНрж░ржлрзЗрж╢ржирж╛рж▓рж┐ржЬржо ржПрж╕ржм ржнрзБрж▓рзЗ ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗржи ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗред ржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржХрзЗ ржирж┐ржЪрзЗ ржирж╛ржорж╛ржмрзЗ, рж╕рзЗржЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржпрзЛржЧрж┐рждрж╛ ржЪрж▓рзЗ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯрзЗржЗред
ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗ ржкржжржмрж┐рж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржирзЗржЗ тАФ ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржжржХрзНрж╖рждрж╛рж░ ржмрзЬржЗ ржЕржнрж╛ржмред рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ рж╕ржм ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ, рждрж╛ржЗ ржХрзЗржЙ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ ржирж╛редржЯрж╛ржЗржЯрзЗрж▓ ржмрзЬ, ржЬржм рж░рзЛрж▓ ржзрзЛржБрзЯрж╛ржЯрзЗ, ржЖрж░ ржжрж╛ржпрж╝рж┐рждрзНржм-ржкрж╛рж▓ржи ржпрзЗржирзЛ рж░рж┐рж▓рзЗрж╢ржирж╢рж┐ржкрзЗрж░ ржУржкрж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржнрж░ ржХрж░рзЗред
ржЖржорж┐ ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗ ржпрзЛржЧ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрж┐ ржПржХ ржмржЫрж░ ржЖржЧрзЗред ржПржЗ ржПржХ ржмржЫрж░рзЗ ржпрж╛ ржжрзЗржЦрзЗржЫрж┐, рждрж╛ ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯ рж╣рждрж╛рж╢рж╛ ржЖрж░ ржЕрж╕рж╣рж╛рзЯрждрзНржмрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржо ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржиржЗ ржЯрж╛рж▓ржмрж╛рж╣рж╛ржирж╛, рж░рж╛ржЬржирзАрждрж┐, ржЖрж░ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзЗ ржкрзНрж░ржорж╛ржг ржирж╛ ржХрж░рзЗржУ рж╕рж┐ржВрж╣рж╛рж╕ржирзЗ ржмрж╕рзЗ ржерж╛ржХрж╛ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖рзЗрж░ ржнрж┐рзЬрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ржпрзЗржи ржмрж┐рж╖рж╛ржХрзНржд рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржЙржарзЗржЫрзЗред
ржЕржержЪ, ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗ рж╕ржлрж▓рждрж╛ ржЖрж╕рзЗ рждржЦржиржЗ, ржпржЦржи ржпрзЛржЧрзНржпрждрж╛, рж╕рзНржмржЪрзНржЫрждрж╛ ржЖрж░ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпржмрзЛржз ржПржХрж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗредрж╢рзБржзрзБржЗ ржмрж╛рж╣рзНржпрж┐ржХ ржЪрж╛ржХржЪрж┐ржХрзНржп ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржнрж┐рждрж░рзЗрж░ рж╢рзВржирзНржпрждрж╛ ржврзЗржХрзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛ред

title: ржмрж╛ржЬрзЗ рж╕ржВрж╕рзНржХрзГрждрж┐, ржжрзБрж░рзНржмрж▓ ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛ ржУ рж╕рзНржмржЬржиржкрзНрж░рзАрждрж┐рждрзЗ ржнрж░рж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐
content:
рж░рж┐ржнрж┐ржЙ:ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржжрзБрж░рзНржмрж▓ ржирзЗрждрзГрждрзНржм, ржмрж┐рж╖рж╛ржХрзНржд ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржХрж╛рж▓ржЪрж╛рж░ ржПржмржВ рж╢рзВржирзНржп ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░рж┐рждрзНржмрзЗрж░ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржЙржжрж╛рж╣рж░ржгред ржмрзЗрждржи рж╕ржорзЯржорждрзЛ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛тАФржХржЦржирзЛ ржХржЦржирзЛ рзк ржорж╛рж╕ ржкрж░рзЗржУ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрждржи ржЖрж╕рзЗред ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржмрж╛ рж░рж┐ржнрж┐ржЙрзЯрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржирж┐рзЯржо ржирзЗржЗред ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ, ржмрж┐рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржХрж░рзЗ CEO, рж╕рзНржмржЬржиржкрзНрж░рзАрждрж┐рж░ ржорж╛ржзрзНржпржорзЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржЪрж╛рж▓рж╛рзЯ, ржпрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ рж╕ржжрж╕рзНржпрж░рж╛ рж╕ржм рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛ ржкрж╛рзЯ ржЖрж░ ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ржжрзЗрж░ ржЕржмрж╣рзЗрж▓рж╛ ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯред

title: Worst company in Chittagong
content:
*Do your research properly before joining any company.*
For the last few months, I worked at a company named #Fytobyte, which had several subsidiary brands like TarteelNetwork, Audcastation, Tarteel Network Bangla, and Qrn+. It was primarily a video content-based company. The team behind the production of these videos was incredibly talentedтАФwe were like brothers, and we still are.
But the main problem was the owner and his father (the Managing Director). They had no vision or planning. The only thing they did was implement new rules every day and create more work for us without considering any salary evaluation.
After Ramadan, they installed CCTV cameras to monitor our activities. They also changed the office hours against our will and introduced a ridiculous rule: if we arrived even one minute late for three consecutive days, they would deduct a full day's salary.
Despite these traumatic and demotivating rules, we continued to do our work diligentlyтАФuploading 7-8 videos regularly. Still, they were never satisfied.
Remember the father? This man had no role in the office. He would come in, take out his phone, call someone, and start screaming like a madman. He constantly bragged about his experience in the garments industry, yet he didnтАЩt even know how to turn on a Bluetooth headsetтАФalways asking for help with the simplest things. His breath was so foul that we couldnтАЩt stand near him; I almost vomited one day.
He tried to stir up office politics by creating fights among us, but thankfully we caught on early. Instead of dividing us, it made our bond even stronger. In front of you, he acted like a saint, but behind your back, he gossiped and badmouthed you to others.
Because he had nothing productive to do, he spent his time watching us on the newly installed cameras. Almost every day, we were called into the office and questioned rudely:тАЬWhy were you standing and talking to each other? DonтАЩt you have work? This is an officeтАФyou canтАЩt talk to each other. WeтАЩre paying you; you must stay seated even if your work is done. You're disturbing others.тАЭMy question isтАФif IтАЩm really disturbing anyone, why hasn't anyone complained to you?I was completing my tasks. We are not robots. We need some time to refresh our minds.
This happened almost every day. On April 28, 2025, he called us in again and repeated the same things. But this time, when we tried to respond logically, he said he wouldnтАЩt listen.тАЬThis is my office. I pay you. You must follow my rules, no matter what.тАЭWe couldnтАЩt tolerate this anymore. Right then and there, five of us decided to resign.
When we submitted our resignations, the father almost got physical with one of us during a heated argument. The owner (his son) got angry and told us to leave immediately.
The son was the most egoistic person IтАЩve ever met. He always sided with his father. Whenever we pointed out a mistake, he either ignored it or defended it with illogical reasoning.
Before I end this, I want to sayтАФIтАЩm glad I resigned.No one should ever work in a toxic environment, no matter how much they are paid.It affects your lifestyle, mindset, and behavior.IтАЩm grateful for the new brothers I found in this journey. We stood by each other, and I believe weтАЩll shine together.Allah is the best planner.Thank You.
#Audcastion #tarteelnetwork #fytobyte#experience #work

title: Extremely Unprofessional and Disrespectful Behavior from Manager Golam Murshed
content:
Working under Golam Murshed has been a deeply frustrating experience. He regularly forces employees to work overtime and on weekends without prior notice or consent. When employees request fair compensation for the extra hours, he dismisses them with demeaning comments like *тАЬYou work in a software firm, not a garment factoryтАЭтАФa statement that not only disrespects our profession but also unfairly belittles garment workers.
He shows no regard for employeesтАЩ personal time, often demanding weekend work at the very last minute, disregarding any personal plans or family commitments. His management style is authoritarian, and his communication lacks basic professionalism and empathy. Such behavior is demoralizing and borders on harassment. No one should be subjected to this kind of treatment in a professional environment.
Golam MurshedтАЩs actions deserve serious scrutiny, and I strongly believe HR or a higher authority should investigate these repeated incidents. No employee should be made to feel disrespected or overworked without fair treatment and compensations.

title: Fantastic place to grow as a software professional
content:
I've had a great experience working at Ultra-X BD. The work environment is positive and supportive, making it easy to stay motivated and productive. One of the standout aspects is the excellent development teamтАФhighly skilled, collaborative, and always ready to share knowledge.
The company also maintains a great work culture, encouraging open communication, mutual respect, and continuous learning. Salaries are always paid on time, which reflects the companyтАЩs professionalism and financial reliability.
Overall, Ultra-X BD is a fantastic place to grow as a software professional. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stable, growth-oriented, and team-driven work environment.

ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░ржХрзНрж░рж┐рзЯрж╛ржЯрж╛ рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржмрж╣рзБржжрж┐ржи ржзрж░рзЗржЗ ржХрж░рзЗ ржЖрж╕ржЫрзЗред ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗржЗ ржирждрзБржи ржирждрзБржи ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржи ржирж┐ржЪрзНржЫрзЗ, ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи ржЕржЬрзБрж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржкрзБрж░рж╛рждржиржжрзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ржж ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрж┐ржЪрзНржЫрзЗред ржП ржпрзЗржи ржПржХ ржЪржХрзНрж░тАФржирждрзБржи ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржи ржирж╛ржУ, ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛ржУ, ржмрж┐ржжрж╛рзЯ ржжрж╛ржУред
ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржирж╢рж┐ржкрзЗ рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧ ржкрзЗрждрзЗ рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржкрзНрж░рж╛рж░рзНржерзАржжрзЗрж░ рзй ржзрж╛ржкрзЗрж░ ржХржарж┐ржи ржкрж░рзАржХрзНрж╖рж╛ ржжрж┐рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯред рж╕рзЗржЗ ржкрж░рзАржХрзНрж╖рж╛рзЯ ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЯрж┐ржХрзЗ ржпрж╛рзЯ, рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ ржорж╛рждрзНрж░ рзз-рзи ржЬржиржХрзЗ ржмрзЗржЫрзЗ ржирзЗрзЯ ржПржмржВ рж╕рж░рзНржмрзЛржЪрзНржЪ рзо,рзжрзжрзж ржерзЗржХрзЗ рззрзж,рзжрзжрзж ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржмрзЗрждржи ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯред ржПрж░ржкрж░ рждрж┐ржи ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржорж╛ржерж╛рзЯ (ржмрж╛ рждрж╛рж░ ржЖржЧрзЗржЗ) ржХрзЛржиржУ ржХрж╛рж░ржг ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржЦрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЫрж╛ржБржЯрж╛ржЗ ржХрж░рзЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯредржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржорж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржЪрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░-ржЯрзЗржмрж┐рж▓, ржкрзНрж░рждрзНржпрзЗржХрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп рзиржЯрж┐ ржХрж░рзЗ ржорж┐ржб-рж╕рж╛ржЗржЬ ржоржирж┐ржЯрж░ ржУ рж╣рж╛ржЗ ржХржиржлрж┐ржЧрж╛рж░рзЗрж╢ржирзЗрж░ ржбрзЗрж╕рзНржХржЯржк ржХржорзНржкрж┐ржЙржЯрж╛рж░ ржерж╛ржХрж▓рзЗржУтАФржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржирзНржпрж╛ржпрзНржп ржмрзЗрждржи ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржорж╛ржирж╕рж┐ржХрждрж╛ ржирзЗржЗред
IRD Foundation-ржПржирж┐ржЬрж╕рзНржмржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржЪрж┐ржирзНрждрж╛ ржХрж░рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржХрзЛржиржУ рж╕рзНржмрж╛ржзрзАржирждрж╛ ржирзЗржЗредржХрж░рзНрждрзГржкржХрзНрж╖ ржпрж╛ ржмрж▓ржмрзЗ, ржЪрзЛржЦ ржмржирзНржз ржХрж░рзЗ рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ржЗ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж╣ржмрзЗред ржпржжрж┐ ржЖржкржирж┐ ржирждрзБржи ржХрзЛржиржУ ржлрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░ ржмрж╛ ржЖржЗржбрж┐рзЯрж╛ ржжрзЗржи, рж╕рзЗржЯрж┐ржХрзЗ ржПржХрзЗржмрж╛рж░рзЗржЗ ржЕржЧрзНрж░рж╛рж╣рзНржп ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯред рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржПржоржиржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржЖржЪрж░ржг ржХрж░рзЗ ржпрзЗржи ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзНрждрж╛ржмрж┐ржд ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржиржУ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпржЗ ржирзЗржЗред
ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗржирзЗрждрзГрждрзНржмрзЗрж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржЦрзБржмржЗ ржкрзНрж░ржХржЯредржХрзЯрзЗржХржЬржи рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржерж╛ржХрж▓рзЗржУ рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж╛ржЙржХрзЗ ржЧрж╛ржЗржб ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржорждрзЛ ржирзЗрждрзГрждрзНржмрзЗрж░ ржЧрзБржгрж╛ржмрж▓рж┐ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗржи ржирж╛ред ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ рж╕рж╛ржзрж╛рж░ржгржд рзн ржерзЗржХрзЗ рззрзж ржЬржи рж╕рзНржЯрж╛ржл ржерж╛ржХрзЗржи, ржпрж╛рж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗржмрзЗрж╢рж┐рж░ржнрж╛ржЧржЗ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржиред
рждржмрзЗ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржжрж┐ржХржУ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржпрзЗржоржи, ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ рж╕ржорзЯ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржПржХрж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЬрж╛ржорж╛рждрзЗ ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬ ржкрзЬрзЗ ржПржмржВ ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржЗрж╕рж▓рж╛ржорж┐ржХ ржЖрж▓рзЛржЪржирж╛ржУ рж╣рзЯред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ рж╢рзБржзрзБржорж╛рждрзНрж░ ржПржЗ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржжрж┐ржХржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржПржХржЬржи ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░ ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржнрж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛ред
ржПржЗ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ рж╢рзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж▓рж╛ржо ржпрж╛рждрзЗ ржирждрзБржирж░рж╛ ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржЖржЧрзЗржЗ ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрждрж╛ рж╕ржорзНржкрж░рзНржХрзЗ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБржЯрж╛ ржзрж╛рж░ржгрж╛ ржкрж╛рзЯред

title: BRAC IT- ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржХржЗ ржоржирж╛ тАФ рждрзЗрж▓ ржорж╛рж░рзЛ рждрзЗрж▓!

title: Excellence through and through
content:
Pros:
Excellent management - probably the best among all software firms in Bangladesh. They genuinely listen to and care about their employees.
Developer-first culture with zero micromanagement. The management structure is almost flat, meaning thereтАЩs no real тАЬboss.тАЭ
You can raise concerns about almost anything without fear, and they will be heard.
Flexible vacation policy and competitive salary.
Free breakfast, lunch, and unlimited snacks throughout the day.
Transportation facilities.
Health insurance.
Great work-life balance.
Cons:
The experience may vary depending on the client you're assigned to. Some clients are great; others, not as much. However, Cefalo is always proactive in helping to resolve such situations.
No provident fund or profit-sharing options.

title: I had a disappointing experience at Hyper systems Ltd
content:
I had a disappointing experience at Hypersystem Ltd. Although the company claims to be a software development firm, the internal structure is disorganized, and proper workflow management is lacking. Deadlines are often missed due to poor planning and a lack of clear processes.
One of the most concerning issues is the irregular salary distribution. Employees are not paid on time, which creates financial uncertainty and stress.
Additionally, the company has a serious problem with its leadership style. Despite having an HR department and a management team, all decisions тАФ big and small тАФ are controlled solely by the CEO. This results in a toxic micromanagement culture where employees have little autonomy or trust.
The CEO is known for being short-tempered, often exhibiting rude and aggressive behavior. This creates a hostile work environment where open communication is discouraged, and morale is consistently low.
Overall, I would not recommend Hypersystem Ltd to software professionals looking for a stable and respectful workplace.

title: ржорж┐рж╖рзНржЯрж┐ ржХржерж╛рж░ ржлрзБрж▓ржЭрзБржбрж╝рж┐

ЁЯФ╣ рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржХрж░рзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржХрж╛рж░ржг ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржЦрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрж┐ржжрзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ржж ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗрзЯредЁЯФ╣ ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржорзЯ ржмрзЗрждржиржЗ ржжрзЗрзЯ ржирж╛ тАФ ржПржЯрж╛ ржЪрж░ржо ржЕржирзНржпрж╛рзЯ ржУ рж╢рзНрж░ржорж┐ржХрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ ржЕржмрж┐ржЪрж╛рж░редЁЯФ╣ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ржирзЗржЗ, ржХрж╛рж░ржг ржорж╛рж▓рж┐ржХ рж╕рж╛рж░рж╛ржХрзНрж╖ржг ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ рж╕ржирзНржжрзЗрж╣рзЗрж░ ржЪрзЛржЦрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрзЗредЁЯФ╣ ржоржирзЗ ржХрж░рзЗржи ржпрзЗржи ржХрзЗржЙржЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░ржЫрзЗ ржирж╛ тАФ ржЖрж░ ржПржоржи ржнрж╛ржм ржХрж░рзЗржи ржпрзЗржи рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ рждрж╛ржБрж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж▓рж╛ржЗржи ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрзЗ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ рж╕ржорзНржкрзВрж░рзНржг ржЙрж▓рзНржЯрзЛредЁЯФ╣ ржПржоржи ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛рзЯ ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░рж╛ рж╕рзНржмрж╛ржнрж╛ржмрж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржирж╛, ржорж╛ржирж╕рж┐ржХ ржЪрж╛ржкрзЗ ржерж╛ржХрзЗред
тЪая╕П ржЫрзЛржЯ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржмрж▓рзЗржЗ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗржХрзЗ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ рж╣рж┐рж╕рзЗржмрзЗ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ ржЙржЪрж┐ржд ржЫрж┐рж▓, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛рж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржкрзНрж░ржмрж▓ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯред ржмрж┐рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржХрж░рзЗ ржПржЗ ржзрж░ржирзЗрж░ ржорж╛ржирж╕рж┐ржХрждрж╛рж░ ржорж╛рж▓рж┐ржХрзЗрж░ ржЕржзрзАржирзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛ ржмрж┐ржкржжржЬржиржХред

title: A Forward-Thinking Tech Company with a Heart
content:
Pros:
Working at AppifyDevs has been an enriching experience. The company stands out for its commitment to delivering high-quality, custom software solutions tailored to diverse business needs. Their dual engagement modelsтАФdedicated teams and project-based collaborationsтАФoffer flexibility and cater to a wide range of client requirements .
The leadership team is approachable and genuinely cares about employee growth and well-being. They foster a supportive environment that encourages innovation and continuous learning. The company's culture promotes collaboration, transparency, and mutual respect, making it a great place to work.
Cons:
As with any growing company, there are areas for improvement. Streamlining internal processes and enhancing communication across departments could further boost efficiency. However, the management is receptive to feedback and actively works towards continuous improvement.
Advice to Management:
Continue to invest in employee development programs and maintain the open-door policy that makes AppifyDevs a welcoming workplace. As the company scales, preserving the close-knit culture will be key to sustaining employee satisfaction and performance.

title: Excellent Work Environment
content:
Back in 2021, I worked at this company as a software engineer for 3тАУ4 months during my probation period, and it was an incredibly positive experience. The learning environment was excellent тАФ I had the opportunity to learn a lot from my seniors, who were always supportive and professional. Time management was taken seriously, and salaries were paid on time without fail. All the employees maintained a high level of professionalism, which made the workplace even more inspiring.
I left the company to pursue higher studies, and the team was very supportive of my decision. They even organized a farewell party and wished me well, which speaks volumes about the company culture. Overall, it was a great place to start my career, and IтАЩm grateful for the experience.

title: ЁЯЪй Beware: This Company Is Full of Red Flags
content: Be very careful with this company. Most of the positive reviews on Glassdoor arewritten by employees under pressure from management.This is a third-party company that will ask you to leave your permanent job and join them immediately, promising placement opportunities. But after joining,they often fail to place you with any client and then terminate you with lame excusesand without any notice. They ruin peopleтАЩs careers without a second thought.Think twice before getting involved with them. Now they'll have their employees write fake positive comments on this platform as well! LOL!

title: Developers Face the Real Struggle
content:
ЁЯФ┤ Constantly Changing Project RequirementsDuring projects, requirements keep changing without proper planning.This makes development extremely challenging for the team, causing delays and confusion.Yet, at the end of the day, if the project doesnтАЩt meet expectations, all the blame falls solely on the developers.
ЁЯФ┤ No Clear Policy for Increment or PromotionThere is no clear structure or criteria for salary increments or promotions.Employees work hard without any clarity about their future growth or career advancement within the company.
ЁЯФ┤ Mismanaged Probation PeriodsAlthough the official probation period is supposed to be 3 months, many employees are kept in probation for 6 to 8 months or longer without proper justification or confirmation.
ЁЯФ┤ Unfair and Changing Bonus PoliciesInitially, Eid bonuses were promised after 3 months of joining.Later, the policy was changed to 6 months тАФ and now, it has been extended to 12 months тАФ all without any formal announcement or written policy update.
ЁЯФ┤ Strict and Unreasonable Leave PolicyEmployees must apply for even a casual leave at least 3 days in advance.Emergency leaves are treated harshly, and many leave requests are rejected without any explanation.Salary deductions are imposed even if employees follow procedures but leaves are denied.
Result:Lack of transparency, poor planning, mismanagement of HR policies, and unfair practices are silently destroying employee morale, trust, and career growth at GhorerBazar.

title: Disorganized Leadership and Toxic Work Culture
content:
Review:While salaries are paid on time, job security is nonexistentтАФyou can be let go at any moment. The leadership team lacks the necessary expertise and professionalism. The CDO relies solely on ChatGPT for all queries, showing no understanding of SDLC. The CTO and CMO lack basic knowledge in their respective fields, and the CEO remains detached from the broader team. Management has no grasp of Agile, Scrum, or effective workflows, and overloads employees with unrealistic expectations without proper support. The work environment feels more like a factory than a professional setting, with employees treated as disposable. With no outside experience, leadership is out of touch with industry standards, leading to poor decision-making and inefficient use of resources.
Advice to Management:Invest in leadership training, embrace Agile methodologies, treat employees with respect, and benchmark against industry best practices to foster a healthier and more productive workplace.

title: Secured job, on-time salary, fun working environment.
content: I've seen all the negative reviews on xpeedstudio on this platform. I've worked with the CTO emran vai very closely and mostofa vai (HR), and Ataur vai (CEO). They supported me when I was sick and gave me enough flexibility. Maybe the flexibility is not available right now. If youтАЩre doing good work, our CTO will definitely give you recognition. And the ceo is a very friendly person. Unless every other company we donтАЩt have any robotic culture. Their might be some problems, but overall I'm grateful to this company for their support in my bad times.

title: Great Culture, Great Peoples
content:
The bosses actually care.They donтАЩt just talk about тАЬpeopleтАСfirstтАЭтАФthey poke their heads in, ask how youтАЩre holding up, and back it up with real perks and breathing room.
Everyone gets a voice.Intern, lead, or the guy who just fixed the coffee machineтАФgood ideas float straight to the top. Titles donтАЩt hog the mic.
Work stays in its lane.When the dayтАЩs done, youтАЩre free to log off, bingeтАСwatch whatever without feeling you should sneak back online.
We chase shiny tech when we can.Most projects run on upтАСtoтАСdate stacks and proper pipelines; if weтАЩre stuck with legacy stuff, itтАЩs only because a client wonтАЩt budge.
The vibe is friendly, not cutтАСthroat.People highтАСfive small wins, share memes in Slack, and donтАЩt treat collaboration like a competitive sport.
No mysterious curtain.Big decisions show up in open chats and town hallsтАФso you always know the тАЬwhy,тАЭ not just the тАЬwhat.тАЭ

The first thing is the visionary CEO. He is a good person and has ambition. The company work on very big big products that other local and international bigger company do as well. I see many company fears to work this type of big product. Only brave CEO can do this.
Second, work culture is good and friendly. any Junior team member can share his/her opinion without any problem.
3rd, on-time salary payment. Loan facility etc.
4th, lunch, breakfast and other facility.
BADS
Comparing work loads, man power is low. So there are work pressure. Although no extra work after office time.
Not many successful products. only 1 or 2 products is successful. I think management is not serious about this.
Hiring process is slow and lengthy.
If the company can improve above things, I'll happily recommend others.

title: Software Engineer
content:
MD = One-Man ArmyтАУ HR, Admin, Developer, JanitorтАж all in one.
SalaryтАУ Comes like a guest during Eid. Rare and always late.
Firing SystemтАУ Forgot to smile? You're out.
IncrementтАУ Always "next month".
Credit HoggerтАУ You work, MD claps for himself.
MeetingsтАУ Mostly MD talking to his mirror.
Work-Life Balance?тАУ Life? What's that?

title: Don't join this organisation
content: Despite being an international NGO, this organization is poorly managed. The senior management team displays clear bias and favoritism, often valuing flattery over genuine performance. Hardworking and capable individuals are frequently overlooked, while those who engage in showmanship or rely on others' work receive undue recognition and promotion. This environment stifles professional growth. I would not recommend joining this organization, as it may hinder your career development.

title: It's good company to work with
content:
I am working here as a junior developer .. it's been a pretty good experience.. definitely the environment is very friendly and easy going... They gave their employee at most respect ... The salary comes between 2-5 day of the month .
But their are some bad parts too... It's relatively growing so still not much organized. Again sometimes it lacks the motivation... I mean it doesn't have any system which motivates the good worker with incentives by performance..
As it has only 1 increment in a year and that's not completely satisfiable amount.. so personally I would like to switch to better company for better opportunity.. still I am afraid I might not get similar environment anywhere else.

title: Toxic management, toxic environment, never get salary on time
content:
Worked here for three years, left the company for almost 1 year, still did not get my salary cleared, did not get any clearence certificates.
In this company there is a culture of insulting people in front of every employee. In some cases for some specific person the management also praise the employee, have to admit that. But the management always try to create pressure over employess to work extra hours. In some cases they will treat you like a garments labour.
You will never get your salary on time. it might take to the last date of next month, for example if you are expecting salary for the month of March, it might take you till the last date of┬а April, in some cases you will not get it. If your salary is over 50k, the avearge paydate starts from next months 24th to the last date. Some of the senior employees did not get salary for 3-4 months. But the management always promise you to give employees this and that, but never fullfill the promise.
I can recall one event where it was Eid month, the eid day was most probably 17th of the month. almost two third of the employees did not get salary of the previous month, only recieved the bonus, and the managing director went to CANADA for one month tour with his family, without paying the salaries. and the management told us that they have no money to pay.
In this company there is no work life balance, no R&D or learning opportunity, will always be overloaded with work, also they will push new works in the existing deadline, and will not increase the deadline.
Also the salary structure is not standard.Over all a depressing environment working here.

title: Overall very good
content:
pros:1) Almost everything is top notch
2) cons:yearly increment is very poor. this is the only one problem here.

title: Destroyed the scope of my career growth
content:
I was selected after multiple interviews (3 technical). I was told that I will be working on Spring boot. I was even asked if i will be able to do projects in their existing Spring boot project. I never knew that it was a lie until the first day of my job there. The team where I was assigned to had a awesome team lead. But, team lead assigned me to people who practically lacked the expertise of training interns. I whole codebase was about 1 gb (just imagine the size of the codebase). I just worked on some mvc projects at my university. And, I was there assigned to work on this legacy codebase which lacked proper coding practices. Also, eight people were working on the project didn't have idea of who was working on what. Two people knew about database more, whereas others knew about something else. It's like as an intern I was expected to learn
everything within a month. I literally was in a shock. It took 5 minutes - 10 minutes to load the entire project first time. And regularly it took 4 minutes. It had so many error logs. Yet none cared. Groovy on grails project is also backdated lacks proper documentation. Whenever i asked them to tell me how it worked, they werent that interested. One of their senior engineer literally doesnt code even though he knows business logic. They lacked passion and the need to write good code. I felt like I was cheated. These people werent engineers. They were developers at best. I was trying to know about how their codebase works. Oneday I faced an issue and asked a senior bhai for help. He said to me literally "Boloder moto kotha bolen ken. Amra nijerai oneke janina eshob. Eshob ghatte jan ken". I was shocked by his unprofessionalism.
Their HR did nothing to redeem my situation. They seemed so helpful. I asked them to transfer me to a new team at the last moment. They told me that they will notify me. But, they didn't do anything. After 3 months I gave up hope. I left that place with tears. This was my first job. I will never forgive BRAC IT for ruining my first job.
Apart from the team lead and two other engineers, rest others are either unprofessional, unsupportive and all of them lacks passion.

title: Shorbange betha, oushodh dibo kotha
content:
Probation Period Mismanagement
Official probation period is 3 months, but some employees are still not confirmed even after 8 months.
Unclear & Changing Bonus Policy
Eid bonus was promised after 3 months.
Later changed to 6 months.
Now the requirement is 12 months тАФ all without formal notice or policy update.
Unfair Increment Structure
Increment after 1 year is only 1,000тАУ3,000 BDT.
Even the best performers receive only 3,000 BDT.
Some employees receive no increment despite meeting KPIs.
Leave Application Rejections Without Reason
Leave requests are often denied without any explanation.
Salary deductions occur if leave is not accepted, regardless of employee compliance.
Strict and Unreasonable Leave Policy
Must apply 3 days in advance for even 1 casual leave.
Emergency leaves involve excessive hurdles.
Excessive Workload
Employees are required to work 6 days a week, with no flexible options.
Unethical Resignation Handling
Employees resigning formally are not paid final salaries on time.
NOCs are delayed or denied.
HR and management provide no cooperation during the exit process.

I joined a company namedAlpha Soft Technology Ltd.on October 1, 2024. From the very beginning, I worked with honesty. However, after a month passed, 10 more days went by and I still didnтАЩt receive my salary. Upon inquiring, I learned that salaries hadnтАЩt been paid for the previous two months either. Then it kept being postponed with excuses like тАЬthis weekтАЭ or тАЬnext week,тАЭ and three months went by.
During this time, the companyтАЩs MD celebrated his birthday by spending hundreds of thousands of taka, drinking alcohol. Moreover, the MD and senior executives would frequently hold parties in the office and consume imported liquor. They organized a New Year picnic and everything else, but still didnтАЩt pay us our salaries.
Unable to tolerate the situation anymore, I resigned. Even after that, for the next five months, they kept giving us dates but never paid. During this time, those of us who were employees lost our dignity in front of our families and in society.
Then, on May 4, we were called again. We went at 10 in the morning. He said he would give us checks, but he arrived at 5 in the evening. Instead of giving us checks, he asked us to sign an NDA. We made it clear that we wouldnтАЩt sign any NDA without receiving our due salaries. At that point, he sent his hired thugs to attack us, issued death threats, and hurled abusive language at us.

title: Looks Like a Company, Feels Like a Trap | Not a Workplace тАФ Just a Well-Packaged Disaster
content:
A Family-Owned Disaster Masquerading as a Tech Company1. A Family Drama, Not a CompanyThis place is run entirely by one family тАФ the MD, CEO, CTO, HR, CFO you name it. If youтАЩre not related, youтАЩre just another disposable worker. They micromanage everything, expect you to work during holidays and from home, and act like they own your time and your life.
2. Salary? Delayed, Cut, or "Pending" ForeverForget regular payments. YouтАЩll get your salary in pieces, whenever they "have funds" тАФ which somehow never aligns with payday. Even with a raise, theyтАЩll hold back the extra. People wait months, year or more to get what they're owed, while leadership burns cash on personal projects and politics.
3. No Growth, No Respect, No Fair PayEveryoneтАЩs underpaid тАФ juniors, seniors, doesnтАЩt matter. Seniors are treated like a liability, often pushed out to save costs. ThereтАЩs no path for learning or promotion, just a stagnant system run by long-time family hires playing boss with zero real skills.
4. Total Chaos, No ManagementNo planning, no task tracking, no real leadership. Work is assigned on whims. One day you're appreciated, the next you're accused of slacking with no reason. Even if you show proof, they wonтАЩt care. ItтАЩs all disorganized, reactive, and toxic.
5. HR & Admin = Power-Tripping MessHR (Tanbeer) and Admin (Tanvir) are the worst part тАФ rude, unprofessional, and completely unaccountable. There are no real policies, just whatever they feel like enforcing that day. TheyтАЩll twist rules, play favorites, and act like theyтАЩre above accountability. Forget support тАФ theyarethe problem.Bonus: Run Now, Regret Later тАФ Trust Me

рзз. ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрж╛рж▓ржирж╛рж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм:ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржкрзНрж░ржХрж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░рж╛рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирж┐ржХ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ рж╕рзНржЯрзНрж░рж╛ржХржЪрж╛рж░ ржирзЗржЗред рж╕ржХрж▓ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ тАУ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛, ржХрж╛ржЬ ржЧрзНрж░рж╣ржг, ржПржоржиржХрж┐ ржмрзЗрждржи ржкрзНрж░ржжрж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржорждрзЛ ржЧрзБрж░рзБрждрзНржмржкрзВрж░рзНржг ржмрж┐рж╖ржпрж╝ тАУ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржорж╛рждрзНрж░ ржмрзНржпржХрзНрждрж┐ (ржЬрж╛рж╣рж╛ржЩрзНржЧрзАрж░ ржирж╛ржоржХ) ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрж╛рж▓ржирж╛ ржХрж░рзЗржиред ржПрждрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржмржЪрзНржЫрждрж╛ ржПржмржВ ржжрж╛ржпрж╝ржмржжрзНржзрждрж╛рж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржерж╛ржХрзЗред
рзи. ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐рж░ ржЕржлрж╛рж░ рж▓рзЗржЯрж╛рж░ ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛:ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐рждрзЗ ржирж┐рж░рзНржмрж╛ржЪрж┐ржд рж╣ржУржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржкрж░ржУ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржЕржлрж╛рж░ рж▓рзЗржЯрж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░ржжрж╛ржи ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржирж╛, ржпрж╛ ржЦрзБржмржЗ ржЕржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржЖржЪрж░ржгред ржПржЯрж┐ ржнржмрж┐рж╖рзНржпрждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ рж╕ржВржХрзНрж░рж╛ржирзНржд ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржкрзНрж░ржорж╛ржг ржмрж╛ рж░рзЗржлрж╛рж░рзЗржирзНрж╕рзЗрж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржШржЯрж╛ржпрж╝ред
рзй. ржмрзЗрждржи ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж╛рж░ржгрж╛:ржЖржкржирж╛ржХрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ ржПржмржВ ржЖржкржирж┐ рж╕рзЗржЯрж┐ рж╕ржорзНржкржирзНржи ржХрж░рзЗ рж░рж┐ржкрзЛрж░рзНржЯ ржХрж░ржмрзЗржи, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржпржЦржи ржмрзЗрждржи ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛рж░ рж╕ржоржпрж╝ ржЖрж╕ржмрзЗ рждржЦржи ржмрж▓рж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржЕржЧрзНрж░рж╣ржгржпрзЛржЧрзНржп, ржЕрж░рзНржерж╣рзАржи ржмрж╛ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░ржпрж╝рзЛржЬржи ржЕржирзБржпрж╛ржпрж╝рзА ржиржпрж╝ред ржПрж╕ржм ржЕржЬрзБрж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржЖржЯржХрзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ред
рзк. ржкрж░рж┐рж╖рзНржХрж╛рж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛ ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛:ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕ржоржпрж╝ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржкрж░ ржмрж▓рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝, "ржПржЯрж╛ ржЖржорж╛рж░ рж░рж┐ржХрзЛржпрж╝рж╛рж░ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржирж╛", ржЕржержЪ ржЖржЧрзЗ рж╕рзЗ ржмрж┐рж╖ржпрж╝рзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕рзНржкрж╖рзНржЯ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ржирж┐ред ржПрждрзЗ ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░ рж╕ржоржпрж╝ ржУ рж╢рзНрж░ржо ржЕржкржЪржпрж╝ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржПржмржВ рждржмрзБржУ ржмрзЗрждржи ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржмржЮрзНржЪрж┐ржд рж╣рждрзЗ рж╣ржпрж╝ред
рзл. ржПржЗржЪржЖрж░-ржПрж░ ржЕржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржЖржЪрж░ржг:ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ HR ржЯрж┐ржо ржЕрждрзНржпржирзНржд рж░рзВржврж╝ ржПржмржВ ржЕрж╕рзМржЬржирзНржпржорзВрж▓ржХ ржЖржЪрж░ржг ржХрж░рзЗред ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржЧржд ржнржжрзНрж░рждрж╛ ржУ ржорж╛ржиржмрж┐ржХ ржЖржЪрж░ржгрзЗрж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм рж░ржпрж╝рзЗржЫрзЗред
рзм. ржЕрждрзНржпржзрж┐ржХ ржХрж░рзНржоржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ ржУ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржирж╛ ржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛:ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржи ржжрзАрж░рзНржШ рж╕ржоржпрж╝ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржПржмржВ рж╕ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рзЗ рзм ржжрж┐ржи ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж╣ржпрж╝ред ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржкрзНрж░ржХрж╛рж░ ржкрзЗржЗржб рж▓рж┐ржн (ржмрзЗрждржирж╕рж╣ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐) ржжрзЗржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржирж╛ред ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржирж┐рж▓рзЗ рж╕рж░рж╛рж╕рж░рж┐ ржмрзЗрждржи ржХрзЗржЯрзЗ ржирзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ред
рзн. ржжрж▓ржмржжрзНржз ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ржирзЗржЗ:ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржЯрж┐ржо ржирзЗржЗ, рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржмрж╛ржзрзНржпред ржПрждрзЗ рж╢рзЗржЦрж╛рж░ рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧ ржХржо ржерж╛ржХрзЗ ржПржмржВ рж╕рж╣ржпрзЛржЧрж┐рждрж╛ржорзВрж▓ржХ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ рждрзИрж░рж┐ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржирж╛ред
рзо. ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржЧржд ржЙржирзНржиржпрж╝ржирзЗрж░ рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧ ржирзЗржЗ:ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐рж░ржнрж╛ржЧ ржХрж╛ржЬржЗ ржПржХржШрзЗржпрж╝рзЗ ржПржмржВ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржзрж░ржирзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржХрж┐рж▓ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржмрж╛ ржХрзНржпрж╛рж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржЧрзНрж░рзЛржерзЗрж░ рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧ ржирзЗржЗред ржирждрзБржи ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ рж╢рзЗржЦрж╛рж░ ржмрж╛ ржЙржирзНржирждрж┐ ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ржУ ржЕржирзБржкрж╕рзНржерж┐рждред
рзп. ржмрзЗрждржирзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржмржЪрзНржЫрждрж╛ ржирзЗржЗ:ржмрзЗрждржи ржХржЦржи ржжрзЗржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ, ржХржд ржжрзЗржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ тАУ ржП ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржкрж░рж┐рж╖рзНржХрж╛рж░ ржзрж╛рж░ржгрж╛ ржжрзЗржпрж╝рж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржирж╛ред ржкрзНрж░рж╛ржпрж╝рж╢ржЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржмрж┐рж▓ржорзНржмрж┐ржд рж╣ржпрж╝ ржПржмржВ ржХрзГрждржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ ржмрж╛ ржЬржмрж╛ржмржжрж┐рж╣рж┐рждрж╛рж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ ржпрж╛ржпрж╝ред

ржПржЗ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ ржЖржорж┐ рж╢рзЗржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж▓рж╛ржо ржпрж╛рждрзЗ ржнржмрж┐рж╖рзНржпрждрзЗ ржЕржирзНржп ржХрзЗржЙ ржПржоржи ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢рзЗ ржирж╛ ржкржбрж╝рзЗ ржмрж╛ ржЕржирзНрждржд рж╕ржЪрзЗрждржи ржерж╛ржХрзЗред ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЗ RapidSmartERP рж╕ржорзНржнржмржд рж╕ржарж┐ржХ ржЬрж╛ржпрж╝ржЧрж╛ ржиржпрж╝ред

title: ржкрзНрж░рждрж╛рж░ржХ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐
content:
ржЬржмрзЗ ржЬрзЯрзЗржи ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржкрж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗржЗ рж╢рзБржиржЫрж┐, ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрждржи рзн-рзо ржорж╛рж╕ ржпрж╛ржмржд рж╣ржЪрзНржЫрзЗ ржирж╛ред ржжрж┐ржм ржжрж┐ржм ржХрж░рзЗ ржЖржорж╛рж░ ржУ рзл ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрждржи ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ред рж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржирж╛ржЗ, ржПржЗ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛ ржУржЗ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛ ржмрж▓рзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ┬а ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржзрж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржЫрзЗред ржХрж╛рж▓ржХрзЗржЗ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрж┐ржм ржмрж▓рзЗ рж╕рзЗржЗ ржХрж╛рж▓ ржЖрж░ ржЖрж╕рзЗ ржирж╛ржЗред ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржПржо ржбрж┐ ржЖрж░рж┐ржлрзБрж▓ ржЗрж╕рж▓рж╛ржо ржЯрж┐ржЯрзБ┬а рж╕рзЗ рж╕ржмрж╛рж░ рж╕рж╛ржоржирзЗ ржЦрзБржм ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ рж╕рж╛ржЬрж╛рж░ ржЪрзЗрж╕рзНржЯрж╛ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ рж╕рзЗ рж╕рзНржмрж╛рж░рзНржерзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржпрзЗржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕ржорзЯ ржкрзНрж░рждрж╛рж░ржирж╛ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрзНрж░рж╕рзНрждрзБрждред ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржУржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржЬрзЯрзЗржи ржХрж░ржЫрзЗ ржХрзЗржУржЗ рж╕ржорзНржкрзВрж░рзНржг ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржкрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржмрзЗрж░ рж╣рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗржирж┐, ржмрж░ржВ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗ ржирж┐рж░ржмрзЗ ржХрж╛ржжрждрзЗ ржХрж╛ржжрждрзЗ ржмрзЗрж░ рж╣рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржЪрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ржорзНржпрж╛ржи рж╕рзЛржирж╛рж▓рж┐ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржЩрзНржХрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рж┐ржирзНрж╕рж┐ржкрж╛рж▓ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рж╛рж░ рж░ржлрж┐ржХрзБрж▓ ржЗрж╕рж▓рж╛ржо ржПржХржЬржи ржЬрзБрзЯрж╛рж░рзБ, ржоржжржЦрзЛрж░ред ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржмрж╕рзЗ ржкрзНрж░рж╛рзЯржЗ ржбрзНрж░рж┐ржВржХрзНрж╕ ржХрж░рзЗ ржЖрж░ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЦрж╛рж░рж╛ржк ржЕржХржерзНржп ржнрж╛рж╖рж╛рзЯ ржЧрж╛рж▓рж┐ржЧрж╛рж▓рж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗред
рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрждржи ржирж╛ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржкрж░ ржорж╛рж╕ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж┐рзЯрзЗ ржмрж╛ржзрзНржп ржХрж░рзЗ рж░рж┐ржЬрж╛ржЗржи ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЦрж╛рж▓рж┐ рж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржЪрж▓рзЗ ржпрзЗрждрзЗред ржЕржержЪ ржПржЗ ржЯрж┐ржЯрзБ рж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржкрзЗрж▓рзЗржЗ ржжрзЗрж╢рзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗ ржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЬрзБрзЯрж╛ ржЦрзЗрж▓рзЗ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржЦрж░ржЪ ржХрж░рзЗ ржЖрж╕рзЗред ржЕржержЪ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗржЗ рждрж╛рж░ рж╕рж╛ржоржирзЗ ржХрж╛ржирзНржирж╛ ржХрж░ржЫрзЗ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржп рждрж╛ржУ рж╕рзЗ ржХрж╛рж▓ ржжрж┐ржм ржмрж▓рзЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж╛рж░ржирж╛ ржХрж░рзЗржЗ ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗред

title: Bad working place for Designer
content: They have a strong design team, but they don't know how to utilise this properly. CEO and other team members are very generous. But if youтАЩre going to work with Nijam your life is going to be hell. He is a very abusive person and he dont care about what you feel. He will insult in your every word and make you feel like youтАЩre a trash even if I'm a woman. If you complain this to the management they will not take any action, if you want to leave job for this reason youтАЩre free to go. They only care about this nijam guy. Also misbehave and insulting publicly is very normal in this company. I might did not face the bad behaviour of others, but while working in the same room I saw the other team leader also behave very badly.

title: Exceptional Development Partner!
content: Working with AppifyDevs has been an outstanding experience. Their team is professional, highly skilled, and truly committed to delivering quality work on time. From clear communication to expert-level problem solving, they exceeded expectations at every stage of our project. Whether it's frontend, backend, or full-stack development, AppifyDevs stands out as a reliable and innovative tech partner. Highly recommended for anyone looking to build scalable and modern digital solutions!

title: Worst Company ever also with worst management
content:

title: Good Team Culture and Flexible Work Environment
content:
I've been working here for a while now, and it's been a great experience. The work environment is relaxed and supportiveтАФthere's no time tracking, which shows the trust they place in their team. The CEO is incredibly friendly and always willing to help. It's a startup with a small team for now, but the CEO has a strong vision and a solid background in DevOps, along with proficiency in multiple programming languages. That makes collaboration much smootherтАФyou donтАЩt need to over-explain things.
The team culture is one of mutual support. No one cares about who works how many hours; we just help each other whenever needed. If you're looking for a place to grow or want to commit long-term, this could be a great opportunity.

title: Management with Zero Technical Knowledge Leading IT Teams
content:
I donтАЩt understand how someone who graduated from accounting or marketing can become the team leader of an IT team. Yet, almost every IT team has this kind of leadership. They have zero understanding of coding, engineering, or how software actually worksтАФbut theyтАЩll keep shouting at you to тАЬfinish it today.тАЭ
The senior developer writes garbage code and always blames others for any issues. Somehow, by flattering the boss and MD, they get promoted every year.
Office hours are from 9:30 AM to 6:00 PM, but if you try to leave at 6, the team leader will give you a dirty look and ask, тАЬHow can you leave at 6? DonтАЩt you have work?тАЭ
There isno career growthтАФI repeat,no career growth.
ThereтАЩs not even a proper tester in the company. The marketing team claims they are the testers.

title: Scamming company | Black money convert to white money
content: I've been working at a company for about a year. The company operates like a multi-level marketing (MLM) business, but it seems like a lot of the money they make comes from shady practices. They collect money from government officers and secretaries, and it looks like they have ways to clean that money and make it look legitimate. as like black money white.

title: An intensively Toxic Management with 0 technical Knowledge
content:
Pros
* Timely salary * Flexible office environment (They don't care what are you doing in free time)
Cons
* Non-Technical Project Managers: The project managers are making developers' lives difficult. They don't understand technical issues and just agree with the MD, even if the task is impossible. Developers have to personally explain the situation to the MD, which adds unnecessary stress. * Unprofessional Behavior: The project managers expect you to stay past 6 PM, even though the official office hours are 9:30 to 6. Leaving on time gets you disapproving looks from them and the MD. * Unrealistic KPIs: The MD values noise and aggression over actual work. Shouting and causing a scene are seen as productive, while quietly doing your job is not appreciated. Poor Salary Review Process: The MD prioritizes another business, Shadhin Music, and rewards those who flatter him. At Gakk, project managers get good raises for pressuring developers, making them seem heroic. * Inappropriate Calls: The project managers often call the wrong developers for issues, even late at night or when you're hospitalized. They don't understand which problems are relevant to which roles. * Lack of Code Quality: There's no emphasis on good coding practices. It's not a great place for junior developers, but mid/senior developers can navigate it. The turnover is high, with no good developers staying more than 1.5 years unless they have personal issues. * No Employee Benefits: There are no lunch, transport, or health benefits. The company provides no support beyond salary, and developers struggle with lunch unless they bring food from home. * No QA Team: There is no dedicated Quality Assurance team, leading to many preventable issues and bugs in the final products. * Difficult to Take Leave: Taking leave is challenging as the management thinks giving two off days a week is generous enough. Additional leave requests are often met with resistance. * No Work From Home: There is no option for working from home. During the COVID crisis, the MD required employees to come to the office, disregarding health and safety concerns.
Advice to Management
Nothing to say. The MD or higher authority will never even check glassdoor. Developers just be careful before join. And negotiate. Hit for the biggest number at first place. Otherwise you'll be dragged behind forever.

title: Run, No less than a garments factory, No growth, just lame showoffs
content: No less than a garments factory. A company with religious show-offs. They donтАЩt have a proper structure; they work in a communist style. No matter if you have 1 year of experience or 6тАУ7 years, youтАЩll get the same designation. Even people with more experience are treated badly. TheyтАЩre more comfortable working with interns. No flexibilityтАФjust rules and regulations. The CTO and CEO behave like a one-man army. They donтАЩt care about what others think. If youтАЩre working on a product, you donтАЩt have any floor to talk. YouтАЩll just do whatever youтАЩre told to. A very bad workplace for software professionals.

title: Good & Ethical Company
content:
I used to work there. Not alrounder, but CEO have great visions.Tight about timing. No extra work but work under pressure. Always pushing harder like all struggling company does.
The great thing is Salary on-time, fixed working hour, breakfast & lunch from the office. Islamic vibe is maintained. But workload is heavy.
eito... motamoti sob dik theke valoi, jodi keu pressure niye kaj shikhte chai, tahole shekhar sujog onek beshi. R jara relax thakte chan, tader jonno ei company na.

title: Beware: No Learning, No Security, Only Oiling the Boss
content:
- The MD has bad history about female employee and the work hour is not suitable for women.
- Environment is toxic, and everybody is busy to oiling the boss.
- No work life balance, people start office at 11 AM and work till night. As long you stay at office as good you are to management they call it dedication. and they care dedication over skills.
- No way to learn or work in Modern Software Engineering coz they hunt project from upwork or freelancer and they have no control over it to take any decision on it.
- Clients is God and the Management will charge you if the client gone away (even it's not your fault).
- You have to work under a supreme leader and you cannot use your own face in git commit. So all the work you done there will be one single person face and name.
- There is no Sr Engineer, if you check employees in linkedin you will see the employees has average 2 years of experience, so when you join it's all about yourself.
- By the time you resign, they will cast you as poison and send you to home office. Also there is higher chance to not get any bonus or even worse to not get the salary.
- I can see some of the JR Dev wrote that they have health insurance and retirement plans which is a big lie, before you join ask them to show any legal document on it, i beat they can't.
It's a big no if you are a Mid level or sr engineer , There is no job security.
Before you joining the toxic office pick some ex-employees in linkedin to verify the work environment and learning scope.
Before you join, Ask to show any legal document about health insurance and retirement plans if they mention any of it in job description or in interview board. It's important to see it coz the boss is big liar.

title: Management appears disconnected from the needs and well-being of their engineering team
content:
While the general employees at DSI are friendly and cooperative, the overall environment is plagued by management bias. Employees are heavily favored by leadership, not based on their work ethic or results, but on how much attention they attract or how well they align with management's directives.
Team leads and engineering managers appear to care more about pleasing upper management than supporting their own teams. Work-life balance is poor┬а requests for work-from-home are denied, and even casual leave is treated as a privilege rather than a right. In some cases, casual leaves are rejected without proper reasoning.
There is also a concerning culture where disagreeing with management can lead to rude or disrespectful behavior from team leads. Employee are fourced to work with leagcy technologies. Talented engineers are being let go, while non-technical individuals some with no knowledge of the software industry are being hired. Favoritism is clear: if you're close to the CTO, your job is safe and you'll receive raises. But if you're working hard behind the scenes and not on their radar, you risk being labeled a low performer.
The so called "transformations" initiated by management are worsening the situation rather than improving it. Engineer morale and satisfaction are decreasing day by day. DSI needs serious internal reform if it wants to retain skilled and motivated talent.

title: Toxic Work Environment: A Company Plagued by Mismanagement, Zero Employee Benefits, and Arbitrary Terminations
content:
Pros
1. Offers good opportunities for freshers to kick-start their careers.2. Management accommodates academic needs, provides support during exams, and deals with other important matters.
Cons
The company runs on the CEO's wish. He doesn't care about labor law. Every day, there is a new policy according to the CEO's convenience. Pay cut/ salary cut is a regular thing here. They don't care about employees' feelings or well-being. Salary is very low as to the market standard. The CEO promotes a toxic culture by firing people with one day's notice, so no job security, and zero work-life balance. The CEO will call for a meeting in the middle of your off day without prior notice. You don't have any option to say "NO".

title: The best fraud company in Bangladesh
content: First of all it's not a software company(though the claim). The CEO is the another hawker with sweet sweet words, CTO is a jocker who always entertain the employees. There is no policies no salary increment, even they will not give you increment which they promised to you. Basically the CEO and CTO chair is given from Metlife project, because Metlife is the main source of income of that company with a huge corruption ( Shoumen Aich, Shohel Reza and Shameem Ahmed syndicate), they will kick you off after finishing the project. You will never get an increment without an offer letter :pThey have not even chair at their office, sometimes you have to seated in a tull, there are no projects at all. Sometimes you will have to find your own job through freelauncer.com or upwork(jodio connect kenar taka tara pay kore). One day we found a rat in their office lunch box. So think thousand times before joining here. Best of luck.

title: Good work culture in Sebpo's Development Department

title: This company isnтАЩt just a bad place to work тАФ itтАЩs a full-time nightmare. Stay away if you value your time, energy, health, and career.
content:
1. Toxic, Family-Oriented Management:The CEO, CTO, MD, COO тАФ basically all leadership roles тАФ are handled by one single person and their close relatives (siblings, in-laws, etc.). They behave like they own not just the company but the employees too. The environment is suffocatingly toxic, with heavy work pressure even during holidays. YouтАЩll be expected to work from home too, without any extra compensation.
2. Unprofessional Salary Policy:Salaries are not paid monthly as promised. Instead, payments are made in random "slabs" depending on their so-called "fund availability". Even when your salary is increased, you won't receive the full amount. They will hold back your money indefinitely. Months will pass тАФ you might complete a year тАФ yet theyтАЩll still owe you part of your rightful salary. Meanwhile, the MD is busy spending company funds for personal interests like elections, while claiming thereтАЩs no budget for employees.(400+ customers, but no money тАФ what a joke!)
3. Low Pay for All Levels:Beginner or senior тАФ it doesnтАЩt matter. Salaries are extremely low for entry-level employees and donтАЩt improve significantly even if you stay and grow. They will always use the excuse of "no fund". If youтАЩre senior, youтАЩre actually at a disadvantage тАФ they'd rather push you out and hire juniors to get the work done cheaply.
4. No Task Management, No Process:ThereтАЩs no proper task allocation or planning. YouтАЩll just be thrown random work based on the MDтАЩs whims. One day, youтАЩll be praised, the next day you might be suspended without reason. Even with full commit logs and Git history as proof, theyтАЩll accuse you of not working.(Management style = Total Chaos.)
5. No Employee Benefits or Job Security:Forget about bonuses, benefits, or job security. It's a simple rule here: If you can survive, stay; if you canтАЩt, leave. Employees are treated as replaceable resources, not as assets.
6. Terrible Food and Hygiene:The company almost never provides good food. Maybe once or twice a year, youтАЩll get something like a tehari treat, but on regular days, the food quality is terrible enough to cause ulcers. No variety, no quality.(Good food? In your dreams.)
7. No Career Growth, Fake Bosses:Employees (mostly family members) have been in the same position for 10-13 years without any growth, yet they act like they are your bosses. Promotion and development are just myths here.
8. Extremely Poor Office Conditions:Broken ACs, faulty PCs and laptops, filthy washrooms with unbearable smells across the entire staircase and even outside on the road. The workplace is unhygienic, uncomfortable, and demotivating.

title: Genieinfo teach - Suitable for absolute beginners seeking an internship, but poor for long-term prospects.
content:
Pros:
Good learning environment.
Opportunities to experiment and practise new skills.
Cons:
Excessive micromanagement.
Fixed start time but consistently late finishes.
Minimal yearly increments.
Risk of termination if questioning overtime, undue pressure, or unfair blame allocation.
Verdict:Only stay to complete an internshipтАФotherwise, leave as soon as possible.

title: The downfall of a good company. This company may not exist in 5-6 years.
content:
This organization, though established and reputed, appears to be struggling with outdated management practices. A notable issue is the poor condition of the companyтАЩs facilities, such as thewashrooms, which is surprising for a software company in todayтАЩs professional environment. Additionally, salary increments are significantly lowтАФoften in the range of2-5%, and in some years, there isno increaseat all. In contrast, C-level executives enjoy substantial salaries, ranging from 10 to 20 lakhs.
There is a lack of coordination in the companyтАЩs workflow, and while the business team often receives managementтАЩs attention and support, the engineering teamтАФwho form the backbone of the organizationтАФdoes not seem to be prioritized. This disconnect between management and the engineering team may ultimately affect the companyтАЩs long-term stability.
Senior leaders are primarily focused on meetingKPIsrather than aligning with the companyтАЩs broader strategic goals. Based on these challenges, there are concerns that the company may face difficulties in the coming years if these issues are not addressed.
