ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржирзЗ рж╕ржарж┐ржХ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпрж╛рзЯржи ржкржжрзНржзрждрж┐рж░ ржШрж╛ржЯрждрж┐ рж░рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ, ржкрзНрж░ржЪрзЗрж╖рзНржЯрж╛ ржУ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржнрж╛ржХрзЗ ржпржерж╛ржпржержнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж╕рзНржмрзАржХрзГрждрж┐ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ред
ржПржЗржЪржЖрж░ ржмрж┐ржнрж╛ржЧрзЗрж░ ржЕржирзБржкрж╕рзНржерж┐рждрж┐:
ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржЖрж▓рж╛ржжрж╛ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржорж╛ржиржмрж╕ржорзНржкржж (HR) ржмрж┐ржнрж╛ржЧ ржирзЗржЗ, ржлрж▓рзЗ рж╕ржХрж▓ рж╕рж┐ржжрзНржзрж╛ржирзНрждрзЗ рж╕рж░рж╛рж╕рж░рж┐ CEO рж╣рж╕рзНрждржХрзНрж╖рзЗржк ржХрж░рзЗржи тАФ ржпрж╛ ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛рж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржкржирзНржерзАред
ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржПржмржВ ржХрж░рзНржоржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛:
рж╢ржирж┐ржмрж╛рж░ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржЕрж▓рзНржЯрж╛рж░ржирзЗржЯрж┐ржнржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржмржирзНржз ржерж╛ржХрзЗ ржмрж▓рж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ, ржХрзЛржи ржмрж┐рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржжрж┐ржирзЗ (ржпрзЗржоржи ржмрзГрж╣рж╕рзНржкрждрж┐ржмрж╛рж░ ржмрж╛ рж░ржмрж┐ржмрж╛рж░) ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржерж╛ржХрж▓рзЗ ржкрж░ржмрж░рзНрждрзА рж╢ржирж┐ржмрж╛рж░ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ред ржПржоржиржХрж┐ рзирзмрж╢рзЗ ржорж╛рж░рзНржЪрзЗрж░ ржорждрзЛ ржЬрж╛рждрзАрзЯ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐рж░ ржжрж┐ржирзЗржУ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржмрж╛ржзрзНржп ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред
ржХрж░рзНржорзА рж╕ржВржЦрзНржпрж╛ ржмржирж╛ржо ржХрж░рзНржоржжржХрзНрж╖рждрж╛:
ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ ржЯрж┐ржорзЗ рззрзж-рззрзл ржЬржи рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ ржкрзНрж░ржХрзГрждржкржХрзНрж╖рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗржи рзи-рзй ржЬржиред ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржХрзЛрзЯрж╛рж▓рж┐ржЯрж┐ржХрзЗ ржирзЯ, ржХрзЛрзЯрж╛ржирзНржЯрж┐ржЯрж┐ржХрзЗ ржкрзНрж░рж╛ржзрж╛ржирзНржп ржжрзЗрзЯ, ржлрж▓рзЗ ржжржХрзНрж╖ржжрзЗрж░ ржЕржмржжрж╛ржи ржЪрзЛржЦрзЗ ржкрзЬрзЗ ржирж╛ред
ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржЧржд ржЙржирзНржирзЯржи ржУ ржЧрзНрж░рзЛржерзЗрж░ ржШрж╛ржЯрждрж┐:
ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржмрж╣рзБ ржмржЫрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗржУ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржХрж░рзНржорзА ржкрзНрж░ржорзЛрж╢ржи ржмрж╛ ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржкрж╛ржиржирж┐ред ржжрзАрж░рзНржШржжрж┐ржи ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗржУ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржЙржирзНржирждрж┐рж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕рзБржирж┐рж░рзНржжрж┐рж╖рзНржЯ ржкрже ржмрж╛ рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧ ржирзЗржЗред
ржЕржпрзЛржЧрзНржп ржирзЗрждрзГрждрзНржм:
ржЯрж┐ржо рж▓рж┐ржбрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗржЗ ржмрзЗрж╕рж┐ржХ ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ ржЬрзНржЮрж╛ржи ржирж╛ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗржЗ ржжрж╛рзЯрж┐рждрзНржм ржкрж╛рж▓ржи ржХрж░ржЫрзЗржиред рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ рж╕ржарж┐ржХржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпрж╛рзЯржи ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржЕржХрзНрж╖ржоред
CEO-ржПрж░ ржЕржкрзНрж░рж╛рж╕ржЩрзНржЧрж┐ржХ рж╣рж╕рзНрждржХрзНрж╖рзЗржк:
CEO ржирж┐ржЬрзЗ ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржХржЧрзНрж░рж╛ржЙржирзНржбрзЗрж░ ржирж╛ рж╣рзЯрзЗржУ ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ ржЯрж┐ржорзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржЯрж┐ ржЖрж▓рзЛржЪржирж╛рзЯ ржЬрзЬрж┐ржд рж╣ржи ржПржмржВ рж╕рж┐ржжрзНржзрж╛ржирзНржд ржжрзЗржи тАФ ржпрж╛ ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржжрзГрж╖рзНржЯрж┐ржХрзЛржг ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЕржирзБржЪрж┐рждред
ржмрж╣рж┐рж░рзНржмрж┐рж╢рзНржмрзЗ ржПржХрж░ржХржо, ржнрж┐рждрж░рзЗ ржЖрж░рзЗржХрж░ржХржо:
рж╕рж╛ржорж╛ржЬрж┐ржХ ржорж╛ржзрзНржпржорзЗ, ржмрж┐рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржХрж░рзЗ LinkedIn-ржП ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ рж╢рзАрж░рзНрж╖ ржХрж░рзНржоржХрж░рзНрждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржорзВрж▓рзНржпржмрзЛржз ржУ ржирзНржпрж╛рзЯрзЗрж░ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рзЗржи, ржЕржержЪ ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрзЗ ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рж╛ржкрзНржп ржкрзНрж░ржорзЛрж╢ржи ржмрж╛ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржЕржмрж╣рзЗрж▓рж┐ржд рж╣рзЯред
ржЕржкрзНрж░рждрзБрж▓ рж╕рж╣рж╛рзЯрждрж╛ ржУ ржЕрж╕рзМржЬржирзНржпржорзВрж▓ржХ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░:
Accounts ржмрж┐ржнрж╛ржЧ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржирзАрзЯ ржХрж╛ржЧржЬржкрждрзНрж░ (ржпрзЗржоржи Pay Slip, Account Statement) ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржЧрзЗрж▓рзЗ ржПржоржи ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржпрзЗржи ржмрж┐рж╢рж╛рж▓ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржжрж╛ржмрж┐ ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ рж╕рж╣рж╛ржирзБржнрзВрждрж┐ ржУ ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░ ржЖржЪрж░ржгрзЗрж░ ржЕржнрж╛ржм рж░рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред

title: Hishabee employee
content:
1. Worst place for tech guys, if they face any investment related issues thay make a major cut off on development team in every now and then
2. When it's time for increment or making permanent then they go for firing old one's and hiring new employees
( this rule is applicable only for development team)
3. Some seniors from individual teams ( like Marketing, Product and HR),┬а think they are the Owner of the Company. TheyтАЩre wrost for oiling, manipulate CEO's,making syndicate's and creating the work place toxi
4. A Senior backend developer ruined full Development team. Though he has also fired from Shuttle, Hishabee and codemoly in a row and completed his hat-trick.
5. No facilities for lunch, snacks, prayer, recreations
6. Sales and customer support teams get unnecessary appreciation than entire development team. Sometimes development team meet tight deadline, tight sprint and amazing release but still unappreciated.
7. Besides these unnecessary deadlines, uneven salary hikes, syndicates of team leaders etc are major problems.

title: Worst Company ever
content: My experience with Softlab IT has been extremely disappointing. They do not pay salaries on time, which causes a lot of financial stress for employees. The work culture is very demanding, with unrealistic expectations and long hours, often requiring work day and night without proper compensation. On top of that, the management is disorganized and unresponsive тАФ thereтАЩs no proper structure or support system in place. I would not recommend this company to anyone looking for a stable and respectful work environment.

title: Bad Management
content: The AVP of the compnay is the worst no one chamcha but according to the MD he is the best. There is no job security one employee can be sacked any time. There is no worklife balance. Unara kono kaaj ashle proper requirement analysis and time analysis na kore start kore dei clinent der commit kore ar employee der chaap dite thake taratari sesh korar jonno sei output jotoi baje hok. Kono testing na korei production a kaaj diye then problem hoile tar daivaar employee der upore dei. Othocho tao QA nei na.Onek boro boro project kore but without tester ar vul hole tar dai vai employee der. Cost komanor jonno ekjon employee er increament na kore take baad diye new employee nei. That chamcha AVP se sob kisu te ha ha kore r baki der bitching kore MD er kase. The only good thing about the company is timely salary. Otherwise that place is toxic. One can feel suffocation there.

title: Bad company
content:
ржкрзБрж░рж╛ржЗ рж╕рзНржХрзНржпрж╛ржо ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ред ржЬрзБржирж┐рзЯрж░ржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЗ ржЦрж╛ржЯрж╛ржЗрзЯрж╛ ржорж╛рж░рзЗред ржЬрж╛ржорж╛ржЗ рж╕рж┐ржЗржУ ржЖрж░ ржмржЙ ржЬрж╛ржорж╛ржЗ ржПрж░ рж╕рж┐ржЗржУред рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗ ржЖрж░рзЗржХ ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░ ржХрж╛ржорж▓рж╛ рж╕рж░рж┐ ржХрж╛ржорж▓рж┐ред ржУрзЯрж╛ржХ ржерзБ ред
ржЬрзБржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЗ ржмрж▓рж┐ ржЬрзАржмржирзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛржжрж┐ржи ржпрж╛ржЗрж╕ ржирж╛ред рж▓рж╛ржЗржлрзЗ ржкрзЗржЗржи ржЦрж╛ржЗрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛ржмрж┐ред

title: ржирждрзБржиржжрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮржжрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржЬрж╛рж╣рж╛ржирзНржирж╛ржо
content:
ржирзЗржЧрзЗржЯрж┐ржнржГ
рззред ржХрж┐рж╕рзНрждрж┐рждрзЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржжрзЗрзЯ, рж░рж┐ржЬрж╛ржЗржи ржХрж░рж╛ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗржЗ ржПржЦржирзЛ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржкрж╛рзЯ ред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржПржжрж┐ржХрзЗ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи ржкрзЛржЧрзНрж░рж╛ржорзЗ рж╕рзНржкржирзНрж╕рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рзЗ ржмрзЗрзЬрж╛рзЯ ред
рзиред ржПржХ, ржжрзЗрж░ ржмржЫрж░ рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржкрж░ржУ рж╕рзЗрж▓рж╛рж░рзА ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржжрзЗрзЯ ржирж╛ ред
рзйред рж▓рзЗржмрж╛ржЬржзрж╛рж░рзА - ржмрж╛рж╣рж┐рж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржлрзЗрж░рзЗрж╢рждрж╛ ржоржирзЗ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ ржЖрж╕рж▓рзЗ рждрж┐ржирж┐ ржорзБрж▓рж╛ ржЭрзБрж▓рж┐рзЯрзЗ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗржЫрзЗржи ред
рзкред ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржкрж╛ржо ржкржЯрзНржЯрзА ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржЧрзБрж░рзБрждрзНржм ржЕржирзЗржХ ржПржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ ред
ржкржЬрж┐ржЯрж┐ржнржГ
рззред ржХрж╛ржЬ ржПржмржВ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржХрж╛рж▓ржЪрж╛рж░ рж╢рж┐ржЦрж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржнрж╛рж▓ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ред
рзиред ржкрзНрж░рзЗрж╢рж╛рж░ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯ ржжрж░рзБржи рж╕рзНржХрж┐рж▓ ржнрж╛рж▓ ржкрж░рж┐ржорж╛ржи ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржк рж╣ржмрзЗ ред

title: Great place to work at Tech Cloud Limited
content: Tech Cloud Ltd is a one of the best IT companies in Bangladesh with a friendly workplace. There are no politics, so everyone feels respected. They always pay salaries on time. The management is kind and listens to employees. The office is nice and helps you work well. I really enjoy working here and recommend Tech Cloud Ltd to anyone!

title: ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ ржпржЦржи ржкрзЗрж╢рж╛ржжрж╛рж░рж┐рждрзНржм рж╣рж╛рж░рж╛рзЯ
content:

title: Frustrating Experience with Ineffective Project Manager AKM Golam Murshed
content:
I had a deeply disappointing experience working under Project Manager AKM Golam Murshed. Before the Eid-ul-Fitr holiday, he indicated me I could complete the project coding and deployment during the extended vacation period. However, he failed to show any consideration for work-life balance or basic decency. Despite the holiday, he scheduled mandatory meetings and expected everyone to work late into the night and on weekends тАФ including during Eid.
Ironically, during regular working hours (from 12 AM to 3:30 PM), he was often unavailable or unresponsive. His project management approach is disorganized and ineffective. WhatтАЩs worse, he lacks fundamental project management practices тАФ thereтАЩs no formal documentation like BRDs or SRS; he communicates requirements verbally only. When issues inevitably arise due to unclear or missing documentation, he refuses to take responsibility and denies giving those instructions in the first place.
His poor communication, time-wasting meetings, and lack of accountability make working with him a draining and demoralizing experience. He frequently sets up unnecessary meetings that waste time and does little to guide or support the team. ItтАЩs extremely concerning that someone so unqualified and unprofessional is holding such a critical role within the company. His approach not only undermines the team but also damages the quality and integrity of the work. Leadership should seriously re-evaluate his position.┬аItтАЩs frustrating to see someone in such an important role lacking the empathy and leadership skills essential for managing people and projects. I sincerely hope the organization re-evaluates such appointments for the sake of team morale and productivity.

title: Best Boss in The World and a Great Team to Work With

title: Unprofessional Workplace with Poor Management and No Work-Life Balance
content: Poor Work-Life Balance: The company has an extremely poor work-life balance. There are no public holidays, not even on significant national days like December 16th, which is ridiculous. False Benefits & Mismanagement: They claim to provide fully subsidized coffee and tea, but itтАЩs a scamтАФthe coffee is terrible, and the management is disorganized. They also mention Friday lunch, but the food quality is extremely poor, likely sourced at a very cheap rate. Lack of Personal Growth: There is no opportunity for personal or professional growth since the company doesnтАЩt have any good projects. Job Insecurity: There is no notice periodтАФthey can fire employees at any time, even telling them today that they donтАЩt need to come in tomorrow. Unprofessional HR Policies: The HR policies lack professionalism and structure. Disrespectful Work Environment: Employees often use informal and impolite language (such as "Tui"), creating an unprofessional and disrespectful workplace. Poor Management & Decision-Making: The management is highly disorganized. For example, the CEO may request the implementation of Feature "A," but after completing half of it, the CTO may say that it is irrelevant to the project. This lack of proper planning leads to wasted time and effort.

title: ржжрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржЕрж╢рж┐ржХрзНрж╖рж┐ржд рж░рж┐ржкрзЛрж░рзНржЯрзЗрж░рзЗрж░ ржорждрзЛ ржХрзНржпрж╛ржирзНржбрж┐ржбрзЗржЯ ржжрзЗрж░ рж░рж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯ ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржкрж░ ржХрж▓рзЗ ржЬрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрзЗрж╕ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржХрж┐ ржмрж╛ржмрж╛ ржХрзЗржоржи рждрзЛржорж╛рж░ ржПржХрзНрж╕ржкрзЗрж░рж┐рзЯрзЗржирзНрж╕?
content:
Worst HR policy in my opinion. They reject candidates then call them to know how the experience of getting rejected was.
I was stunned after hearing this shit over the phone. why even call a rejected candidate when you want nothing to do with him?
The HR acts so busy all the time time but its a shame that they failed to understand that the candidates might be busy and their time is valuable too.
When you want a feedback from a rejected candidate, give a good fucking explanation in the rejection email other than a single liner vanilla bullshit. Time is valuable to everyone.You did not even spend a little time to explain why you rejected me, then call me and expect me to give you advice and share my experience? The audacity to think that i'll spend my time talking to shitbags like you!
Unforgettable experience. Just imagine getting a call like this.

title: Ideal for Career Growth at HawarIT
content:
HawarIT Limited stands out as a dynamic and forward-thinking Dutch-Bangladeshi IT company, renowned for its expertise in custom software development, GIS applications, engineering drawing and modeling, photogrammetry, and LiDAR services.Since its inception in 1994, HawarIT has cultivated a reputation for delivering high-quality, cost-effective solutions to a diverse clientele, including multinational corporations and governmental organizations.
Proven Track Record:With over two decades of experience, HawarIT has successfully completed numerous projects, including more than 20 in the Netherlands and over 30 web, mobile, and online marketing initiatives.hawarit.com
Global Presence with Local Expertise:Operating back offices in Bangladesh since 2000, HawarIT combines European quality assurance with the scalability and cost-efficiency of its Bangladeshi operations.
Innovative Services:The company offers a broad spectrum of services, from software development and engineering modeling to GIS data services and photogrammetry, ensuring comprehensive solutions for complex technical needs.
HawarIT is committed to fostering a supportive and adaptable work culture:
Employee-Centric Policies:Employees appreciate the company's fixed office hours (9 AM to 6 PM), timely salary disbursements, and quality office amenities like high-quality lunches and unlimited tea and coffee.Glassdoor+1Glassdoor+1
Collaborative Atmosphere:The management is described as approachable and receptive to feedback, contributing to a positive and collaborative workplace environment.Glassdoor
Flexible Resource Models:HawarIT offers various resource placement models, including onsite, offsite, hybrid, and Build Your Own Team (BYOT) options, allowing for tailored collaboration that meets specific project requirements.
For professionals seeking to advance their careers, HawarIT provides ample opportunities for learning and development:
Diverse Projects:Engagement in a wide array of projects across different domains ensures continuous learning and skill enhancement.hawarit.com
Supportive Environment:The company's culture encourages knowledge sharing and collaboration, making it an excellent place for both new graduates and experienced professionals to thrive.
In summary,HawarIT Limited exemplifies a harmonious blend of technical excellence, flexible work practices, and a nurturing environment, making it a standout choice for clients and professionals alike.

ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛рж░ рж╣рж┐рж╕рж╛ржм ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржирж╛ ржкрж╛рж░рж╛рзЯ ржЗржиржнрзЗрж╕рзНржЯрж░ ржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЧрзЗржЮрзНржЬрж╛ржо ржПржмржВ рж░рж┐ржЬрж╛ржЗржи ржХрж░рзЗ ржУрж▓рж┐ ржЖрж╣рж╛ржжред ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржЪрж╛рж▓рж╛ржЫрзЗ рж╢рзБржнржжрзАржк ржЧржВ рж░рж╛ред

ржПржоржбрж┐ ржорзАрж░ ржорж╛рж╕рзБржж ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржХрзЗ ржЗрж▓ржи ржорж╛рж╕рзНржХ ржоржирзЗ ржХрж░рзЗред ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржи ржПржорзНржкрж▓рзЯрж┐ржжрзЗрж░ ржЧрж╛рж▓рж┐ ржирж╛ ржжрж┐рж▓рзЗ ржЙржирж╛рж░ ржнрж╛ржд рж╣ржЬржо рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ред ржПржорзНржкрж▓рзЯрж┐рж░рж╛ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛рж░ ржЖржЧрзЗ ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░, рж╕рж┐ржЗржУ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗржЗ рж░рж┐ржЬрж╛ржЗржи ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЪрж▓рзЗ ржЧрзЗрж╕рзЗ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи ржмрж╛ржЪрж╛ржЗрждрзЗред ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржПржХрзНрж╕ ржорж┐рж▓рж┐ржЯрж╛рж░рж┐ ржмрзБрзЬрж╛ ржнрж╛рзЬ ржПржирзЗ ржбрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗржХрзНржЯрж░ ржмрж╛ржирж╛рзЯ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗ ржжрж┐рж╕рзЗред
ржЖрж╕рж▓ ржХрж╛рж╕рзНржЯржорж╛рж░ ржПрж░ ржЪрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржХржо ржХрж╛рж╕рзНржЯржорж╛рж░ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛рзЯ рж╕рж░ржХрж╛рж░ ржПрж░ рж░рзЗржнрзЗржирж┐ржЙ рж╢рзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ ржлрж╛ржХрж┐ ржжрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржпред

title: Excellent working environment
content:
Working atPrime Tech Solutionshas been a rewarding experience. The work environment is friendly, supportive, and collaborative, which makes day-to-day tasks enjoyable. The company embraces modern technologies, giving employees the chance to work on challenging and innovative projects across various industries.
ThereтАЩs a strong focus on professional growth, and IтАЩve had opportunities to expand my skills in .NET, Python, and cloud technologies. The management is approachable and open to feedback, and they genuinely care about employee development.
In terms of compensation, the salary is competitive for the industry, and performance is recognized with timely appraisals and bonuses. Overall, PTSL is a great place to grow both technically and professionally.

title: ржЬржШржирзНржп ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ, ржХрзНржпрж╛рж░рж┐рзЯрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржмрж╛рж░рзЛржЯрж╛ ржмрж╛ржЬрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрж┐ржмрзЗ
content: ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ рж╕ржм ржЪрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржлрж╛рж▓рждрзБ,рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЦрж╛рж▓рж┐ ржЪрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ржорзНржпрж╛ржиржХрзЗ рждрзЗрж▓ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржп рж░рзЗржбрж┐ ржерж╛ржХрзЗред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржЕржпрзЛржЧрзНржп рж▓рзЛржХрзЗрж░рж╛ ржмрзЬ ржкржжрзЗ ржерж╛ржХрзЗ,ржЖрж░ ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржХрж┐ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржЖржЯржХрж╛рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯ,рж╕рзЗржЗ ржЪрж┐ржирзНрждрж╛рзЯ ржерж╛ржХрзЗ,ржХрж╛рж░ржи ржЕржирзНржп ржПржХржЬржи ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗ рждрзЛ рждрж╛рж░ ржЕрж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛, ржЪрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ржорзНржпрж╛ржи рждрж╛ржХрзЗ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржмрж▓ржмрзЗред ржбрзНржпрж╛ржлрзЛржбрж┐рж▓ ржХрж░ржкрзЛрж░рзЗржЯ ржХрзЛржи ржнрж╛ржЗржм ржирж╛ржЗред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржПрж░рж╛ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржирж╛ ржХрж░ржкрзЛрж░рзЗржЯ ржорж╛ржирзЗ ржХрж┐ред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржирж╛ ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░ ржПрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж┐ред ржЖржЬржм ржПржХ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржиред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржбрзБржХрж▓рзЗ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржХрзНржпрж╛рж░рж┐рзЯрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржмрж╛рж░рзЛржЯрж╛ ржмрж╛ржЬрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрж┐ржмрзЗред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ рж╕ржм ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржПржХрж╛ржЗ ржПржХ ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржи

title: рзз ржХрзЛржЯрж┐ рзкрзж рж▓рж╛ржЦ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ Loss followed by Cost Cutting
content:
It's not the employees fault that the company has absolutely horrible security policy and some random troglodyte leaked a client's private banking data in his personal GitHub repo (who was deservingly laid off with 2 months severance) but the employees are definitely suffering from it through strict cost cutting in company facilities, worse than lackluster increments, and worst of all, experienced developers getting laid off and replaced by freshers because of lower salary (But the upper management has the nerve to defend this bullcrap by saying that seniors lose their touch quickly but newly grads have a fresher mindset in work). Company used to increment like 60 to 80% for good performance but now they raise like 5k or 15k if you're lucky.
Fresher salary may look good to you but you're not getting much raise if you stay in this company. Also freshers are kept without work for a long time. Plenty of guys who joined this company a year ago and still haven't joined a project. Some guy didn't even come to the company for a whole year while getting paid and it took the management A YEAR to notice. Tells you a lot about how they manage employees. Their response to this is banning work from entirely for everyone unless you are literally dying.

title: ржмрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗ ржлрж┐ржЯржлрж╛ржЯ ржнрж┐рждрж░рзЗ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБржЯрж╛ рж╕ржжрж░ржШрж╛ржЯ
content:
ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрж╢ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржнрж╛рж▓ ржжрж┐ржХ ржЖржЫрзЗ рж╕рзЗржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ржЗ ржЖржЧрзЗ ржмрж▓рж┐ред
ржЦрж╛ржмрж╛рж░ ржжрж╛ржмрж╛рж░ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛржЗ ржжрзЗрзЯ
ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ржЯрж╛ ржЕржирзЗржХ рж╕рзБржирзНржжрж░ред ржбрж╛ржЗржирж┐ржВ ржПрж░ ржЬрж╛рзЯржЧрж╛ржЯрж╛ржУ ржмрзЗрж╢ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛред ржнрж┐ржЙ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛред рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗ ржЦрзЛрж▓рж╛ ржЫрж╛ржжред
ржоржи ржЪрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЗ рж╕рзБржЦржЯрж╛ржи ржжрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржЬрж╛рзЯржЧрж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ, ржЫрж╛ржжрзЗржУ ржПржЗ рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗред
рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рзА ржЕржиржЯрж╛ржЗржоред рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рзА ржирж┐рзЯрж╛ ржХрзЛржи рж╣рж╛ржВржХрж┐ ржкрж╛ржВржХрж┐ ржирж╛ржЗред
ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржЧрзЗржорзЗрж░ ржЬрж╛рзЯржЧрж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржШрзБржорж╛ржирзЛрж░ ржЬрж╛рзЯржЧрж╛ ржУ ржЖржЫрзЗред
ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржПржХрж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржнрж╛рзЯрзЗрж░рж╛ ржЧрж╛ржи ржзрж░рзЗред ржоржи ржЪрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЗ ржЯрзБржВ ржЯрж╛ржВ ржмрж╛ржЬрж╛ржирзЛрж░ ржпржирзНрждрзНрж░ржкрж╛рждрж┐ ржЖржЫрзЗред
ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░ ржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрзА ржлрзНрж░рзЗржирзНржбрж▓рж┐ред рж╕ржЪрж░рж╛ржЪрж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирзА ржЧрзБрж▓рж╛рж░ ржоржд ржмржж ржПржЗржЪ ржЖрж░ ржирж╛ ржорзЛржЯрж╛ржорзБржЯрж┐ред
ржУрзЯрж╛рж░рзНржХ рж▓рж╛ржЗржл ржмрзНржпрж╛рж▓рзЗржирзНрж╕ ржорзЛржЯрж╛ржорзБржЯрж┐ ржЖржЫрзЗ ржЯрж┐ржорзЗрж░ ржЙржкрж░ ржЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБред
ржПржмрж╛рж░ ржЖрж╕рж┐, рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗред
ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржмрзЗрж╢ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ рж╕рзЗржХрзНржпрзБрж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ржЬржорзЗрж░ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯрзЗрж░ рж▓рзЛржХ ржПржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрзАржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржХрзНржпрж╛ржЪрж╛рж▓ ржУ ржХрж░рзЗред рж╕рзЗржХрзНржпрзБрж▓рж╛рж░ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржПрж░ ржЦрзБржм ржзрж╛рж░рзЗ ржХрж╛ржЫрзЗ ржШрзБрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ржжрзЗрж░ рждрзБрж▓ржирж╛рзЯред
ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж╛ржо ржирж╛ ржХржЗрж░рж╛ ржЖржЬрж╛ржЗрж░рж╛ ржмржЗрж╕рж╛ ржерзЗржХрзЗржУ, ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржПрж░ ржкрзНрж░рж┐рзЯ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрзА рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛рзЯред ржкрж╛ржЪрж╛ржЯрж╛, рждрзЗрж▓ ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рж╛ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржкрж╛ржмрзНрж▓рж┐ржХ рж╕ржмржЦрж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржпрзЗржи ржПржХржЯрзБ ржмрзЗрж╢рзАржЗред
ржЕржзрж┐ржХрж╛ржВрж╢ ржХрзНрж╖рзЗрждрзНрж░рзЗ ржПржХржмрж╛рж░ ржпржжрж┐ ржХрзЛржи ржХрж╛рж░ржгрзЗ рж░рзЗржкрзБржЯрзЗрж╢рж╛ржи ржЦрж╛рж░рж╛ржк рж╣рзЯ, ржЬрж╛ржи ржжрж┐рзЯрж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ ржЖрж░ рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛рж░ ржжрж╛ржо ржкрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛ред
ржЯрж┐ржо ржУрзЯрж╛ржЗржЬ ржкрзНрж░ржЪрзБрж░ ржбрж┐рж╕рзНржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорж┐ржирзЗрж╢рж╛ржи ржЖржЫрзЗред ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржЯрж┐ржо ржПрж░ рж▓рж╛ржЗржлрзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржЪрж┐рж▓, ржЗржнрзЗржи ржЯрж┐ржо ржорзЗржорзНржмрж╛рж░ ржжрзЗрж░ ржУред ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржЯрж┐ржорзЗрж░ ржЕржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛ред рж▓рж╛ржЗржл рж╣рзЗрж▓ рж╣ржЗрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛ржЗрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗред
ржЗржжрж╛ржирзАржВржХрж╛рж▓рзЗ рж▓рзЗ ржЕржл ржХрж╛рж▓ржЪрж╛рж░ рж╢рзБрж░рзБ ржХрж░ржЫрзЗред
рж╕ржмржЪрж╛ржЗрждрзЗ ржмрзЬ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛, ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржПрж░ ржкрзНрж░рж┐рзЯ ржкрзБрждрзНрж░рзЗрж░рж╛ ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛, ржЕржирзНржп ржХрзЗржЙ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржЦрж╛ржЯржирзА ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ рж╕ржм ржмрзЗржХрж╛рж░ред
ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржирж╛рж▓ ржкрж▓рж┐ржЯрж┐ржХрж╕ рждрзЛ ржЖржЫрзЗржЗ, ржП ржУрж░рзЗ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ, рж╕рзЗ рждрж╛рж░рзЗ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ, ржПржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗржЗред ржоржЬрж╛рж░ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░, ржПржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржЙржкрж░ ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржпрж╛рзЯред ржпрзЗржЯрж╛ ржПржХрзЗржмрж╛рж░рзЗржЗ ржЙржЪрж┐ржд ржирж╛ред ржЖрж░ ржЙржкрж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржПржЗржЧрзБрж▓рж╛ ржЗржиржнрзЗрж╕рзНржЯрж┐ржЧрзЗржЯ ржУ ржХрж░рзЗ ржмрж▓рзЗ ржоржирзЗ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ред
ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржирж┐рж░рзНржжрж┐рж╖рзНржЯ ржХрзБрж▓ ржбрзБржбрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛рж░рзНржХрзЗрж▓ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ржЯрж╛ ржПржжрзЗрж░ржЗред ржмрж╛ржХрж┐рж░рж╛ ржХрж┐ ржорж┐ржЯрж┐ржВ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржирж╛ржХрж┐ ржХрж┐ ржХрж░рзЗ, рждрж╛рждрзЗ ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржи ржЪрж┐ржирзНрждрж╛ ржирж╛ржЗред ржПрж░рж╛ ржХрзБрж▓, ржПрж░рж╛ ржпрж╛ ржоржи ржЪрж╛рзЯ ржХрж░ржмрзЗред ржПрж░рж╛ ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржПрж░ ржХрзНрж▓рзЛржЬред
ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ ржмрзЯрж╕ рж╣ржУрзЯрж╛ ржЕржжрзНржнрзБржд рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржЖржЫрзЗред ржпрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржХрж╛ржЫрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рзА ржорж╛ржирзЗ ржжрж╛рж╕рждрзНржмред ржкрж╛ржЧрж▓рзЗрж░ ржоржд ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рждрзЗ рж╣ржмрзЗред рж▓рж╛ржЗржлрзЗ ржХрзЛржи ржЪрж┐рж▓ ржХрж░рж╛ ржпрж╛ржмрзЗ ржирж╛ред ржПрж░рж╛ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗрж░рж╛ржЗ ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБред ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░, ржЬрзБржирж┐рзЯрж░рж░рж╛ ржмрж╛ржирзЗрж░ ржЬрж▓рзЗ ржнрж╛ржЗрж╕рж╛ ржЖрж╕рж╛ред ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБрж░ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж╛рж░рзНрждрж╛ ржерзЗржХрзЗ рж╢рзБрж░рзБ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржУ ржЬржШржирзНржпред
ржХрзЗржЙ ржХрзЗржЙ рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржкрж░рзНржпрж╛рзЯрзЗрж░ ржЖржЫрзЗ, рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржорждрзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржирж╛ ржорж┐рж▓рж▓рзЗ, ржЬрж┐ ржмрж╛ржВрж▓рж╛рж░ ржоржд, ржУржд ржкрж╛ржЗрждрж╛ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЧрж┐ржЯрзНржЯрзБ рж▓рж╛ржЧрж╛рзЯрзЗ рж▓рзЗ ржЕржл ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржХрж░рж╛рзЯред
рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рзА рж░рзЗржиржЬ ржЖрж░ ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржжрзБржЗржЯрж╛ржЗ ржпрзЗ ржХрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ ржнрж┐рждрзНрждрж┐рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯ ржЬрж╛ржирж╛ ржирж╛ржЗред ржЕржирзЗржХ ржЦрж╛ржЯржирзА ржХрж░рж╛, ржХрж╛ржЬ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЛ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ ржкрж╛рзЯ ржПржХрж░ржХржо ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯред ржЖржмрж╛рж░ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржлрж╛ржкрж░ ржкрж╛рж░рж╛ ржкрж╛ржмрж▓рж┐ржХ, ржХрж╛ржо ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХржо ржХржЗрж░рж╛ ржкрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржЖрж░ржУ ржмрзЗрж╢рзАред ржЦрзБржмржЗ ржкрзБрж░ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рзА рж╕рзНржЯрзНрж░рж╛ржХржЪрж╛рж░ред
ржжрзБржЗ ржИржжрзЗ ржжрзБржЗ ржмрзЛржирж╛рж╕, ржЖрж░ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рзА ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржЕржирзНржп ржЖрж░ ржХрзЛржи рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛ ржирж╛ржЗред ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржмрзИрж╢рж╛ржЦ, ржмрж╕ржирзНржд, ржирж┐ржЙ ржЗрзЯрж╛рж░рзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзНржЯрж┐ рж╣рзЯред
ржлрж╛ржЙржирзНржбрж╛рж░рж░рж╛ ржжрзБржЗржЬржи ржжрзБржЗрж░ржХржо, ржПржХржЬржи ржЕржирзЗржХ ржлрзНрж░рзЗржирзНржбрж▓рж┐, рждрзЛ ржЖрж░рзЗржХржЬржи рж╕рж┐рж▓рзЗржХрзНржЯрж┐ржн ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржХржерж╛ржЗ ржмрж▓рзЗ ржирж╛ред ржПржоржиржХрж┐ рждрж╛рж░ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржЦрж╛рж░рж╛ржк ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж╛рж░, ржПржоржиржХрж┐ рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ржЬржирзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржмрж╛ржЬрзЗ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржПрж▓рж┐ржЧрзЗрж╢рж╛ржи рж╢рзБржиржЫрж┐ред

title: Software engineer
content:
They hire freshers in bulk with salary less than their own peon.
The software team is lead by 2 leads who has zero knowledge on core technology. The system is running on codes older than 20 years. The product team has no product knowledge and changes things as per mood of CEO. To be noted that CEO is a respected figure in the IT industry whose main focus is now activism and being a wanna be politician.
Its good for fresher as u can learn and break things which are already broken, they are surviving as no jobs site are available yet.
This business is running only for the sales team and you will question your ability as an engineer everyday.
Idk how this product is still alive,┬а maybe for the blessings of unemployed youth whom they are also monetizing with pro version..
Business....

title: ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЛржЧ ржЖрж░ ржЫрж╛ржБржЯрж╛ржЗ (Hire & Fire)
content:
рзз. ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ рж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржЧрзЛржирж╛ ржХржпрж╝рзЗржХржЬржи рж╕рж┐ржирж┐ржпрж╝рж░ рж╕рзНржерж╛ржпрж╝рзА ржкржжрзЗ ржЖржЫрзЗ, ржмрж╛ржХрж┐рж░рж╛ рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ ржЕрж╕рзНржерж╛ржпрж╝рзАред рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржЫрж╛ржБржЯрж╛ржЗ рж╣ржмрзЗржЗтАФржПржЯрж╛ ржпрзЗржи ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐рждред
рзи. ржХрж╛ржЙржХрзЗ рж╕рзНржерж╛ржпрж╝рзА ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ, ржЫржпрж╝ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржорж╛ржерж╛ржпрж╝ рж╣ржарж╛рзО ржЫрж╛ржБржЯрж╛ржЗ ржХрж░рзЗ ржжрзЗржпрж╝ред
рзй. ржирждрзБржи ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржкрзНрж░ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯ ржПрж▓рзЗ рж╣рзБржЯ ржХрж░рзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржЗржЮрзНржЬрж┐ржирж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЛржЧ ржжрзЗржпрж╝ред рждрж╛рж░ржкрж░ рзм-рзн ржорж╛рж╕ ржкрж░ ржПржХрзЗ ржПржХрзЗ ржЫрж╛ржБржЯрж╛ржЗ рж╢рзБрж░рзБ рж╣ржпрж╝ред рж╢рзБрж░рзБрждрзЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржжрж┐ржи рззрзи-рззрзй ржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛рждрзЗ рж╣ржпрж╝, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржорзЗрж░ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржжрзЗржпрж╝ ржирж╛ред
рзк. ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржмрзЗрждржирзЗрж░ рж▓рзЛржн ржжрзЗржЦрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ рж▓рзЛржХ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЛржЧ ржжрзЗржпрж╝, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржкрзНрж░ржЬрзЗржХрзНржЯрзЗ ржирж┐рж░рзНржнрж░рждрж╛ ржХржорж▓рзЗржЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж░ржХржо ржЖржЧрж╛ржо ржЬрж╛ржирж╛ржирзЛ ржЫрж╛ржбрж╝рж╛ржЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржмрж╛ржж ржжрзЗржпрж╝ред ржП ржзрж░ржгрзЗрж░ ржЖржЪрж░ржг ржпржжрж┐ ржкрзНрж░ржержо ржмрж┐рж╢рзНржмрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржжрзЗрж╢рзЗ рж╣рждрзЛ, рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржПрждржжрж┐ржирзЗ ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ рж▓рж╛ржЗрж╕рзЗржирзНрж╕ржЗ ржмрж╛рждрж┐рж▓ рж╣ржпрж╝рзЗ ржпрзЗрждред
рзл. ржИржжрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржмрзЛржирж╛рж╕ ржирзЗржЗ, ржХрж╛ржЬ ржЖрж░ ржмрзНржпржХрзНрждрж┐ржЧржд ржЬрзАржмржирзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржнрж╛рж░рж╕рж╛ржорзНржп ржирзЗржЗред ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ рж╣рж┐рж╕рзЗржмрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ рж╣ржпрж╝ ржирж╛ред
ржЖржкржирж┐ ржЪрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЗ ржПржЯрж┐ ржЖрж░ржУ рж╕ржВржХрзНрж╖рж┐ржкрзНржд ржмрж╛ ржЖрж░ржУ ржлрж░рзНржорж╛рж▓ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж░рзВржк ржжрж┐рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рж┐ тАФ ржХрзА ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗ ржмрзНржпржмрж╣рж╛рж░ ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржи рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ ржЬрж╛ржирж╛рж▓рзЗ ржЖрж░ржУ ржирж┐ржЦрзБржБрждржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж╕рж╛ржЬрж╛рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржмред

title: Very Bad Culture  - Hire & Fire
content:
There are a few senior resources here who are permanent; the rest are all temporary. Employeesmustbe laid off eventually.
Even after making someone permanent, they lay them off within six months.
When a new project comes in, they hire a lot of engineers. Then, after 6тАУ7 months, they gradually start laying them off. At the beginning of the project, employees have to work 12тАУ13 hours a day, but thereтАЩs no overtime pay.
They lure employees with high salaries, but as soon as the project dependency decreases, they suddenly fire them. If this were a company in any first-world country, their license would be revoked.
No Eid bonus, no work-life balance. Employees are not treated like human beings.

title: A Deeply Dysfunctional Family-Run Company
content:
This isnтАЩt a companyтАФitтАЩs a family-run disaster. Nearly every employee is a cousin, sibling, or distant relative. If you're not part of their bloodline, you're nothing more than disposable labor. The so-called CEO operates remotely from the UK, pretending to lead a global business merger while exploiting Bangladeshi workers who carry the entire workload without fair compensation, appreciation, or timely pay.
Salaries are constantly delayed with recycled excuses, and raises are a fantasy unless you're a relative or a shameless bootlicker. Promotions arenтАЩt based on performance or skillтАФtheyтАЩre based on who you're related to or how well you can suck up to management.
The hiring process is laughable. Interviews exist only to maintain a facade. If you're not already тАЬinтАЭ with the family or one of their minions, youтАЩre wasting your time. Most decisions are made behind closed doors with zero transparency or fairness.
The company is infested with toxic employees whose only talent is flattery. These leeches secure permanent positions while hardworking, talented staff are ignored, mistreated, or pushed out. ThereтАЩs constant verbal abuse, public humiliation, and no HR accountabilityтАФbecause HR is just another family puppet who makes and breaks rules on a whim.
The companyтАЩs leadership is a complete farce. Two brothers act as co-owners, but their incompetence and lack of integrity are glaring. They preach about professionalism, but their actions reflect pure hypocrisy. They create strict policies only to break them for themselves and their favorites.
Recently, they promoted another unqualified cousin to the role of COO. This individual lacks basic manners, education, or leadership qualitiesтАФbut got the job solely through nepotism. He now walks around barking orders with no clue how to lead.
Employee benefits? Another joke. тАЬUnlimited coffeeтАЭ turns into monthly salary deductions if you drink more than two cups a day. Lunch? Controlled with petty rules. Time off? If youтАЩre family, you get it without question. If not, good luck getting approved.
If a relative leaves and goes abroad, they can return months later and be reinstated immediately. But for others :D.
This company thrives on favoritism, manipulation, and exploitation. There is no vision, no ethics, and certainly no future. ItтАЩs a textbook example of how mixing business with nepotism creates a hellish, demoralizing, and utterly dysfunctional environment. A place where talent dies, and mediocrity is promotedтАФloudly and proudly.

title: Serious Mismanagement and Favoritism by HR and CTO
content:
HR Mismanagement (J.M. Tariq):The individual acting as HR, J.M. Tariq, lacks even the most basic knowledge of HR responsibilities. He is unable to draft proper emails and has no control over core HR operations тАФ these are instead handled by the project manager. A clear example of his negligence: he was assigned the task of opening employee salary accounts at BRAC Bank, which he failed to do. Every time an employee followed up, he lied, claiming the process was complete when it clearly wasnтАЩt. Despite repeated incidents, the management took no action against his continued incompetence and dishonesty.
CTO Behavior (Aminul Hossain):The CTO, Aminul Hossain, demonstrates unprofessional and unethical behavior. He has been seen sleeping during important meetings and shows favoritism towards certain employees. During performance appraisals and increment periods, he often claims the company has no budget тАФ yet he wastes employee's money on any picnic and lives in 5 star room and travel by air and employees are forced to contribute money for official picnics or events and gives lowest service.

title: Poor salary, expects everyone to know everything
content: They take 4 phases of interview for an Assistant QA Engineer, ask for 2 years of experience and then offer only 18k salary. ItтАЩs as if they think theyтАЩre hiring servants.

title: Joke of a company
content:
This company can't be deemed as a company. Well this company started with some junior devs with no professional experiences at all and even after being told they weren't even slightest interested in hiring a senior software engineer and guess what all the projects were standing on a thin line and to be frank these were more like school projects
About the salary cap there will be only one bonus even if it was mentioned in the contract there will be two bonuses. Company is run by a big head ( actually a woman) who has zero knowledge on how to manage a company.
Sacking is a common thing in this company. They don't like you in the next day u find yourself jobless. Job security is the most most unsecured one in this company

title: They are number one fraud
content: The organization claims to offer client-focused and customized software solutions based on individual requirements. However, they do not have an in-house development team. Instead, they purchase pre-built themes from platforms like CodeCanyon and simply upload them to the server, presenting them as their own work. Additionally, they fail to provide salaries on a regular basis, and their overall behavior and professionalism are severely lacking.

title: Say no to do job here
content:
Working at BERI feels like being trapped in a cycle of exploitation. The higher-ups smile to your face but sabotage you behind closed doorsтАФtheyтАЩll gaslight, blame, and manipulate to hide their own incompetence. The environment is poison: coworkers are too stressed or distrustful to collaborate, and interns get treated like free labor. TheyтАЩll dangle promises of growth, only to dump crushing workloads on you with no pay for overtime, no resources, and no support.
Projects are set up to fail. YouтАЩre forced to handle tasks meant for entire teams alone, then screamed at when itтАЩs impossible. When things go south (which they always do), youтАЩre the scapegoat. TheyтАЩll fire you, trash your reputation, and move on to the next target. ItтАЩs not just burnoutтАФitтАЩs systematic abuse.
They break labor laws daily, but nobody cares. You leave feeling used, financially drained, and questioning your worth. DonтАЩt fall for their lies. This place doesnтАЩt just ruin careersтАФit destroys people.

title: Bad HR, Unprofessional Management
content:
A new and a small company named Exabyting, probably has one of the worst HR managers ever. I have heard from an employee that they usually don't call anyone for the interview from that application form. It is mainly the reference call. Also, they can't even properly make an application form. When I try apply in the google form, it says that I already responded which I did about 10 months ago or maybe before that. My CV has changed a lot in 10 months, why not update the form? Why are you so busy Mr Senior HR manager? Same happened with many other people. People were saying that in the comment. But the linkedin page admin keep on removing those comments. Those comments were not even bad. They were just informing.
The main culprit is the bearded HR guy, Mohammad Syduzzaman. This Senior HR Manager does not reply to comments, emails, or messages. He seenzoned me and my friend's text messages.
We may not be your employees, but treating candidates with respect tells us a lot about the company management.

title: Thinking dev as a personal slave
content:
1. PM's are worst employee here. Does not have any technical knowledge yet thinking dev will always support and migrate things in weekend.
2. PM Calls in midnight that they need immediate support yet their favourite dev can easily waste the time and does not meet deadline.
3. Did not appreciate any thing. Even does not QA our task. They always think that if they delivered more faster then they can get appreciate. Then if any bug releases then pm calls and say it just a simple case why need a qa
4. The pm's doesn't have knowledge where to test. Even they say to deploy directly in production without any testing.
****Very risky job for any dev. Don't even join.

title: Not a single good thing from this company!
Software Engineer ll
content: They didnтАЩt provide lunchтАФnot even basic evening snacks regularly . Despite claiming their revenue has doubled, employee salaries saw less than a 25% yearly increment. ItтАЩs disappointing to see such a mismatch between company growth and how little that success is shared with the people driving it. Morale doesnтАЩt run on profits alone.

title: Excellent work culture
content: Excellent work culture. Outstanding management and good salary structure.

title: Cursing Someone in Particular
content:
His knowledge is surface level at best but he acts like he knows more than a guy with 20 years of experience. Through good relation with the CTO from early in his career helped him gain his protection bubble so that he could climb up the management chain fast after his two separate failures in business. He doesn't let his newly hired underlings learn anything properly, rushes through everything for a quick but lackluster result and treats anyone less experience than him like a not know anything so that he can destroy their self esteem and boost his own. Unfortunate, because he would've been an okay guy if all this management bullshit didn't inflate his fragile ego.
Everyone else in the company is pretty cool tho except for some old seniors who google translate the motivational posts from muslim alpha male tiktokers.
Also not the best place if you wanna learn something or boost your career, but then again, which company in bd is?

title: Worst workplace
Great for culture
content: If you are a dev & need mental peace, go for bs23. Forget the salary.

title: Recruit and fire. Forced and unpaid overtime. Delay and unpaid payment.
content:
Recruit employees as intern. Keep them motivated to do overtime. If you don't, they sack you (without notice) and pay no salary. Recruit new interns and cycle goes on. Their motivations include, "increment after three months", "client agreed to pay after prototype delivery", "funding on the way", "will give share on profit" etc. Receive salary by the end of next month (if lucky) or with even more delay. Sales team is the biggest victim. First, attend office hours, then go to field work by evening and attend online client meetings by night.
If you have been sacked, forget your salary. You may call and message the CEO, CTO again and again. And after loads of messages and calls, if they respond all you'll hear is, "next week/month." Funny part, they even play games internally. CEO tells CTO, "no fund in bank" each month. And CTO downloads free Theme Forest items but gets the payment from CEO. CTO seems employee friendly, pretends all fault goes to the CEO and keeps you constantly motivated even by saying, "I personally take responsibility of your increment/salary/promotion". Just wait till that time comes or you resign or be sacked. Friendly big bro vide {transform:rotate(180deg)}.

title: Fraud CEO Hafiz, escaped without paying all workers Salary
content:
Beware of this fraudulent company.
CEO Hafiz escaped without clearing employee salaries.
All workers have 5тАУ6 months of unpaid dues.
No transparency in management or finances.
Employees were overworked and underpaid.
No proper HR or grievance redressal system.
Sudden shutdown without any notice.
Team morale was constantly low.
Clients left due to poor service and broken promises.
Multiple legal issues are still pending.
Absolutely not recommended for job seekers or clients. Avoid at all costs.

title: They donтАЩt hire employment, they hire people for slavery with the lowest of wage possible.
content: This company thrives on under paid workers working overtime just for a dream to be software engineer, women are paid less than men and when this topic arises they say "A man has families to take care of...", they make you work on a single off day of the week making their employees work almost 30 days of a month, no leave on emergency even if you do take one you'll have to fullfil it by working on your off days, even if you take one of your rightful off days they corner you and make you feel guilty for taking one, 24/7 comparison culture "Ei Bhaia 20 din Tana kaj koreche..." etc etc, the HRs Tarikul and new one have the rudest of behaviour, even the washrooms are not clean, if you resign for any emergency purpose such as health degradation they will with hold your salary and cut it from the previous work days. title: Worst Workplace Ever
content:
Pros
Nothing special to work here. Mr. Ashiq who will abuse you saying bad words. That's how a educative cheif representative behaves, too much work load. Their another employee line manager tasnia also in a same category.
Cons
Don't expect too much from here, if you are fresher and quickly wants to learn how to take excessive workload then join here and after 6 months leave company as soon as possible. They will crunch your life like paper. Sometimes you need to work on weekend, and they donтАЩt pay for that. Ashiq is a nightmare for bit mascot.
Advice to Management
1. Resign tasnia and ashiq from here
2. Try to get some rules from HR that brings life to the employee
3. Try to appoint employee by their skill not nepotism
4. Don't make life hell of the employee
5. Try to give competitive salary
6. Try to maintain scheduled work time employees are human not computer to work more than duty time
7. Don't pressurize dev or QA team to finish the work that is impossible to do
8. Give extra pay if your working more.
9. Try to make healthy work culture.

title: Pathetic Workplace
content: At Xeon Technology, employees have to work 6 days a week, yet the salary they offer is quite low. Despite having 1.5 years of experience, they offered me only 20,000 BDT. They seem to be looking for a developer or QA at a cheap rate, and as a result, the quality of their work reflects that.

title: Waste Of Time
content: ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ рж╣рж╛рзЯрж╛рж░рж┐ржВ ржХрзЗржирзЛ рждрж┐ржиржорж╛рж╕ ржзрж░рзЗ рж╣рзЯ ржПржЗржЯрж╛ ржПржХ ржЕржжрзНржнрзБржд ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░ред ржХрж╛рж░рзЛ рж╣рж╛рждрзЗ ржЕржврзЗрж▓ рж╕ржорзЯ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗ ржЖрж╕ржЫрзЗ ржирж╛ ржзрж░рзЗ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржпржжрж┐ ржПржкрзНрж▓рж╛ржЗ ржХрж░рзЗ рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░рзЛрж╕рзЗрж╕рзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ рж╕рзЗ ржЖржЧрж╛рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗредрждрж╛рж░ржкрж░ MCQ, First Technical, Second Technical рж░рж╛ржЙржирзНржб ржкрж╛рж╕ ржХрж░рзЗ ржлрж╛ржЗржирж╛рж▓ рж░рж╛ржЙржирзНржб ржжрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ рзирзж ржжрж┐ржи ржкрж░ ржпржЦржи ржорзЗржЗрж▓ ржЖрж╕рзЗ required "Technical Ability" meet ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржирж╛ржЗ рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржЕржмрж╢рзНржп ржЕржврзЗрж▓ рж╕ржорзЯ ржерж╛ржХрж▓рзЗржУ ржХрж┐ржЫрзБржЯрж╛ ржоржи ржЦрж╛рж░рж╛ржк рж╣рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗредржПржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржлрж╛ржЗржирж╛рж▓ рж░рж╛ржЙржирзНржбрзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржб judge ржХрж░рждрзЗ ржЖрж╕рж╛ ржжрзБржЗржЬржи ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрж┐ ржпржЦржи ржХрзЛрж╢рзНржЪрзЗржиржЗ ржарж┐ржХржорждрзЛ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗ ржирж╛, ржХрзЛрж╢рзНржЪрзЗржи ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЖрж╕рж╛рж░ ржкрзНрж░рзЯрзЛржЬржирзАрзЯрждрж╛ржУ ржмрзБржЭрзЗ ржирж╛ рждржЦржи ржорж╣рж╛ ржЬрж╛ржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржХрж░ржмрзЗ ржПржЗржЯрж╛ржУ ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐ржд рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯред ржХрзЛржб рж░рж┐ржнрж┐ржЙ ржЯрж╛ржЗржорзЗ ржПржоржкрзНрж▓рзЯрж┐рж░ рж░рзБржб ржмрж┐рж╣рзЗржн ржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрж┐ржд ржХрж░рзЗ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржкрзНрж░рзЛржлрзЗрж╢ржирж╛рж▓рж┐ржЬржоред

рзкредрждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ржХрж╛ржЫрзЗржмрж┐ржирзНржжрзБржорж╛рждрзНрж░ржЯрзЗржХржирзЛрж▓ржЬрж┐рж░ржЬрзНржЮрж╛ржиржирзЗржЗредржХрзЗржХрзАржХрж╛ржЬржХрж░ржмрзЗ,рждрж╛рж░ржУржХрзЛржирзЛржзрж╛рж░ржгрж╛ржирзЗржЗред
рзлредржЖрж░ржмрзЗрждржи!ржЖржкржирж┐ржпржжрж┐ржПржХржЯрзБржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрж╣ржи,рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗрж╢рзБржиржмрзЗржи: "ржПрждрждрж╛рж░рж╛рждрж╛рж░рж┐ржПрждржмрзЗрждржиржжрж┐рзЯрзЗржХрзАржХрж░ржмрзЗржи?"

рзоредржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯрж╣рзЯржмрзЗрж╕рж┐ржХрзЗрж░рззрзж%,рж╕рж░рзНржмрзЛржЪрзНржЪрзйрж╣рж╛ржЬрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛редржХрж╛рж░ржг, "ржЖржкржирж┐рждрзЛрж╕рж╛рж░рж╛ржжрж┐ржиржмрж╕рзЗржерж╛ржХрзЗржи,ржХрж┐ржЫрзБржЗржХрж░рзЗржиржирж╛ред"
рзпредржжрзБ-ржПржХржЬржиржЧрзЛрзЯрзЗржирзНржжрж╛ржирж┐рзЯрзЛржЧржжрж┐рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗ тАУржХрзЗржХрзАржХрж░ржЫрзЗржжрзЗржЦрж╛рж░ржЬржирзНржпредржПржмржВржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯржХрзЗржЬрж╛ржирж╛ржирзЛрж░ржЬржирзНржпред
рззрзжредржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗLinkedIn,QuoraржПржоржиржХрж┐рж╕ржмрж▓рж╛рж░рзНржирж┐ржВрж╕рж╛ржЗржЯржУржирж┐ржЙржЬрж╕рж╛ржЗржЯржЖржЗржкрж┐ржерзЗржХрзЗржмрзНрж▓ржХржХрж░рзЗрж░рж╛ржЦрж╛рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗредржХрж╛рж░ржг, "ржЖржкржирж╛ржХрзЗрж╢рзЗржЦрж╛рж░ржЬржирзНржпржмрзЗрждржиржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж╣рзЯржирж╛ред"
рззрззредржЖржкржирж┐ржПржХржЯрзБржмрж┐рж╢рзНрж░рж╛ржорзЗрж░ржжрж░ржХрж╛рж░рж╣рж▓рзЗржУржпрзЗрждрзЗржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗржиржирж╛ ржЕржержмрж╛ ржмрзНрж░рзЗржХ ржирж┐рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗржи ржирж╛ржлрж┐ржЩрзНржЧрж╛рж░ржкрзНрж░рж┐ржирзНржЯржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржпрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЗ рж╕рж░ржХрж╛рж░рзА ржирж┐рзЯржорзЗ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ рзо ржШржирзНржЯрж╛рзЯ рзйрзж ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯ ржмрзНрж░рзЗржХ ржПрж░ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рж╛ ржЖржЫрзЗ редржХрж╛рж░ржг, "ржЪрзАржиржЖрж░ржЖржорзЗрж░рж┐ржХрж╛рж░ржЬрж╛рзЯрж╛ржирзНржЯржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ржЧрзБрж▓рзЛржУрждрзЛржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ржжрж┐ржХрзЗржЗржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ржлрзЛржХрж╛рж╕ржХрж░рзЗ, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ рж╕рж╛рж░рж╛ржжрж┐ржи рж░рзЗрж╕рзНржЯ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗ ржПржд ржмрзЬ рж╣рждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рждрзЛ ржирж╛ ред"
рззрзиредржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬржХрж┐ржВржмрж╛ржЕржирзНржпржХрзЛржирзЛржкрзНрж░рж╛рж░рзНржержирж╛рж░ржЬржирзНржпржУржпрзЗрждрзЗрж╣рж▓рзЗржлрж┐ржЩрзНржЧрж╛рж░ржкрзНрж░рж┐ржирзНржЯржжрж┐рзЯрзЗржпрзЗрждрзЗрж╣ржмрзЗредржХрж╛рж░ржг, "ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ржЬржирзНржпрждрзЛржЖржкржирж╛ржХрзЗржкрзЗржорзЗржирзНржЯржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛рж╣рзЯржирж╛ред" ржПржжрж┐ржХрзЗ ржорж╛рж▓рж┐ржХ ржирж┐ржЬрзЗ ржорзБрж╕рж▓ржорж╛ржи, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржХржЦржирзЛ ржирж╛ржорж╛ржЬ ржкрзЬрждрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ ржпрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛ред
рззрзйредрж╕ржмрж╕ржорзЯрзиржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ржирзЛржЯрж┐рж╢ржкрж┐рж░рж┐рзЯржб;рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржжрзБржЗржИржжрзЗрж░ржЖржЧрзЗрж╕рзЗржЯрж╛рззржорж╛рж╕,ржЖрж░ржХржЦржирзЛржХржЦржирзЛржПржХржЗржжрж┐ржирзЗржЗржЖржкржирж╛рж░рж╢рзЗрж╖ржжрж┐ржиржШрзЛрж╖ржгрж╛ржХрж░ржмрзЗ тАУржпрж╛рждрзЗржмрзЛржирж╛рж╕ржирж╛ржжрж┐рждрзЗрж╣рзЯред
рззрзкредржЖржкржирж╛ржХрзЗрж╢рзБржирждрзЗрж╣ржмрзЗ: "ржЖржкржирж┐ржлрж╛ржБржХрж┐ржмрж╛ржЬ,ржХрж╛рж░ржгржЖржкржирж┐рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧржкрзЗрзЯрзЗржорж╛ржерж╛рзЯржЙржарзЗржЫрзЗржиред"ржЕржержЪржЖржкржирж┐ржУржЗ рж╕ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рзЗржЗржЬрзЯрзЗржиржХрж░рзЗржЫрзЗржиред
рззрзлредрж░рзЛржЬрж╛рж░ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржоржд ржмрж░ржХрждрзЗрж░ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗржУрж╢рзЗрж╖ржжрж┐ржирзЗржЖржкржирж╛ржХрзЗрж╢рзБржирждрзЗрж╣ржмрзЗ: "ржПржЗржорж╛рж╕ржЖрж╕рж▓рзЗржЗржЖржорж╛рж░рж▓рж╕рж╢рзБрж░рзБрж╣рзЯрзЗржпрж╛рзЯредржЖржкржирж╛ржжрзЗрж░ржмрзЛржирж╛рж╕,рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ тАУржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░рж╛ржХрзЛржирзЛржХрж╛ржЬржХрж░рзЗржиржирж╛редрж╢рзБржзрзБржЖрж╕рзЗржиржЖрж░ржЪрж▓рзЗржпрж╛ржиред"
рззрзмредржпржжрж┐ржмрж╕рзНрждрж┐ржПрж▓рж╛ржХрж╛рзЯржмрж┐ржжрзНржпрзБрзОржирж╛ржерж╛ржХрж╛рж░ржШрзЛрж╖ржгрж╛ржЖрж╕рзЗ,рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗрж░рж╛рждрзнтАУрзоржЯрж╛рж░ржкрж░ржЯрзЗрж▓рж┐ржЧрзНрж░рж╛ржорзЗржорзЗрж╕рзЗржЬржЖрж╕ржмрзЗ: "ржХрж╛рж▓ржХрзЗрж░ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ржжрзБржкрзБрж░рззржЯрж╛ржерзЗржХрзЗрж░рж╛рждрззрзжржЯрж╛ред"

content: You will find one of the best office cultures in BD. Islamic vibes are everywhere, no complaints on salary disbursement time, work hours are flexible, enough leaves, and many pros.

title: MicroMac Techno Valley Ltd. - ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржм ржХрж░рзНржо-ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛рж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржпрж╛рж╕ |  CEO ржЖржирж┐рж╕ рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржмрзЗрж░ ржЫрзНржпрж╛ржБржЪржбрж╝рж╛ржорж┐ ржПржмржВ ржЯржХрзНрж╕рж┐ржХ ржХрж░рзНржо ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢

content:
1. ржмрзЗрждржи ржУ ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ ржнрж╛рж░рж╕рж╛ржорзНржп ржирзЗржЗ:
ржмрзЗрждржи ржХрж╛ржарж╛ржорзЛ ржЕрждрзНржпржирзНржд ржжрзБрж░рзНржмрж▓; ржЬрзБржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ рззрзж рж╣рж╛ржЬрж╛рж░ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛рж░ ржирж┐ржЪрзЗ ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ рж▓рзЗржнрзЗрж▓рзЗрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛ржирзЛ рж╣рзЯред
рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ ржмрзЗрждржи рзйрзл-рзкрзл рж╣рж╛ржЬрж╛рж░ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛рж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ рж╕рзАржорж╛ржмржжрзНржз, ржпрж╛ ржЗржирзНржбрж╛рж╕рзНржЯрзНрж░рж┐рж░ рждрзБрж▓ржирж╛рзЯ ржЕржкрзНрж░рждрзБрж▓ред ржпрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржХржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ ржлрзНрж░рзЗрж╢рж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ржЗ рзйрзж рж╣рж╛ржЬрж╛рж░ ржжрзЗржЗред
2. ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржУ ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржо:
рж╕рж╛ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рж┐ржХ ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ рж╢рзБржХрзНрж░ржмрж╛рж░ ржУ рж╢ржирж┐ржмрж╛рж░ рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ ржЕржзрж┐ржХрж╛ржВрж╢ ржбрзЗржнрзЗрж▓ржкрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж░ рж╢ржирж┐ржмрж╛рж░ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ ржЖрж╕рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯред
ржЫрзБржЯрж┐рж░ ржжрж┐ржирзЗ ржЙржкрж╕рзНржерж┐ржд ржирж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржмрзЗрждржи ржХрж╛ржЯрж╛рж░ рж╣рзБржоржХрж┐ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯред
ржЕрждрж┐рж░рж┐ржХрзНржд ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржо рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛ ржирзЗржЗред
3. ржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржУ рж▓рж┐ржбрж╛рж░рж╢рж┐ржк рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛:
CEO ржЕрждрзНржпржирзНржд ржХрж┐ржкржЯрзЗ ржПржмржВ ржкрж┐ржЫржи ржерзЗржХрзЗ рж╕рж┐ржжрзНржзрж╛ржирзНржд ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржкрж░рж┐ржЪрж╛рж▓ржирж╛ ржХрж░рзЗржиред
ржЯрж┐ржо рж▓рж┐ржбрж░рж╛ ржорзЗрж░рзБржжржгрзНржбрж╣рзАржи; рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЯрж┐ржорзЗрж░ ржкржХрзНрж╖рзЗ ржжрж╛ржБрзЬрж╛рзЯ ржирж╛, ржмрж░ржВ CEO-ржПрж░ ржХржерж╛рзЯ ржЙржаржмрж╕ ржХрж░рзЗред
ржПржХржЬржи рж╕рж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж░ ржЯрж┐ржо рж▓рж┐ржб рж╕ржмрж╕ржорзЯ ржЕржирзНржпржжрзЗрж░ ржирж┐ржЪрзЗ ржЯрзЗржирзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрждрзЗ ржЪрж╛рзЯ; ржирждрзБржи ржЯрзЗржХржирзЛрж▓ржЬрж┐ ржЕржкржЫржирзНржж ржХрж░рзЗ ржПржмржВ ржЕржЧрзНрж░ржЧрждрж┐ ржерж╛ржорж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗрзЯред
4. ржЕржкржорж╛ржи ржУ рж╣рзЗржирж╕рзНрждрж╛:
ржЪрж╛ржкрзЗрж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржУ рж╕рж╛ржорж╛ржирзНржп ржнрзБрж▓рзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржЕржкржорж╛ржи, ржЦрзЛржЯрж╛ ржУ рждрзБржЪрзНржЫ-рждрж╛ржЪрзНржЫрж┐рж▓рзНржп ржХрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯред
ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ рж╕рзНржмрзАржХрзГрждрж┐ ржирзЗржЗ, ржмрж░ржВ appraisal-ржПрж░ рж╕ржорзЯ ржнрзБрж▓ рждрзБрж▓рзЗ ржзрж░рж╛ рж╣рзЯред
5. ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗрж░ рж╕ржВрж╕рзНржХрзГрждрж┐ ржУ рж░рж╛ржЬржирзАрждрж┐:
ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржЕрзНржпрж╛рж╕рж┐рж╕рзНржЯрзНржпрж╛ржирзНржЯрж░рж╛ CEO-ржПрж░ ржЫрж╛рзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ рж░рж╛ржЬржирзАрждрж┐ ржХрж░рзЗ; ржЧрж╕рж┐ржк ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржХрж╛рж░рзНржпржд ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рзЗ ржирж╛ред рж░рж╛рж╕рзНрждрж╛ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЯрзЛржХрж╛ржЗ ржзрж░рзЗ ржирж┐рзЯрзЗ ржПрж╕рзЗ ржлрж░рзНржирзНржЯ ржбрзЗржХрзНрж╕рзЗ ржмрж╕рж╛рзЯ ржжрж┐ржЫрзЗред
ржХрж▓рж┐ржЧржжрзЗрж░ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржЪрзЗрзЯрзЗ ржХрзБрзОрж╕рж╛ рж░ржЯржирж╛ржЗ ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ ржкрзНрж░ржЪрж▓рж┐рждред
6. ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛рж░ ржЬржЯрж┐рж▓рждрж╛:
рж░рзЗржЬрж┐ржЧржирзЗрж╢ржирзЗрж░ рж╕ржорзЯ рзй ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ржзрзНржпрждрж╛ржорзВрж▓ржХ ржирзЛржЯрж┐рж╢ ржкрж┐рж░рж┐рзЯржб ржерж╛ржХрзЗ, ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржирж╛ржирж╛ ржЙржкрж╛рзЯрзЗ рж░рж┐рж▓рж┐ржЬ ржжрзЗрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ред
рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐/ржмрзЛржирж╛рж╕ ржХрзЗржЯрзЗ рж░рж╛ржЦрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржПржмржВ ржПржХрзНрж╕ржкрзЗрж░рж┐рзЯрзЗржирзНрж╕ рж╕рж╛рж░рзНржЯрж┐ржлрж┐ржХрзЗржЯ ржжрзЗрзЯрж╛рж░ ржмрзНржпрж╛ржкрж╛рж░рзЗ ржЯрж╛ржирж╛рж╣рзЗржБржЪрзЬрж╛ ржЪрж▓рзЗред
ржХрж╛ржЙржХрзЗ рж╕рж╣ржЬрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЫрж╛рзЬрждрзЗ ржжрзЗрзЯ ржирж╛, ржПржХржЯрж┐ тАЬржмржирзНржз ржжрж░ржЬрж╛тАЭ рж╕ржВрж╕рзНржХрзГрждрж┐ред ржПржЦржи ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржХрзЗржЙ рж╕рж╣ржЬрзЗ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржЫрж╛рзЬрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░ржЫрзЗ ржмрж▓рзЗ рж░рзЗржХрзЛрж░рзНржб ржирзЗржЗред

ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржиржЯрж┐ ржирждрзБржи ржкрзНрж░ржпрзБржХрзНрждрж┐ ржЧрзНрж░рж╣ржгрзЗ ржЕржирж┐ржЪрзНржЫрзБржХред

8. ржЕрждрж┐рж░рж┐ржХрзНржд ржЪрж╛ржкрзЗ ржЯрж╛рж╕рзНржХ ржерзНрж░рж╛рж╕рзНржЯ:
ржЕржлрж┐рж╕ ржЯрж╛ржЗржо рж╢рзЗрж╖ рж╣ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржарж┐ржХ ржЖржЧ ржорзБрж╣рзВрж░рзНрждрзЗ ржоржбрж┐ржЙрж▓ ржбрзЗрж▓рж┐ржнрж╛рж░рж┐ ржЪрж╛ржЗрж▓рзЗ, "рззрзж ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯрзЗрж░ ржХрж╛ржЬ" ржмрж▓рзЗ ржлрж╛ржБржжрзЗ ржлрзЗрж▓рзЗ ржЕрждрж┐рж░рж┐ржХрзНржд рзз-рзи ржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ ржХрж╛ржЬ ржХрж░рж╛рзЯ CEO ржЖржирж┐рж╕ рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржмрзЗред

title: A Hire And Fire Company
content:
Pros:
- Everyone is friendly тАФ CEO, CTO, COO тАФ everyone is more like some cool dudes.
- Flexible work culture.
- Internet bill is covered.
Cons:
-┬аNew employees are asked to leave a review on Glassdoor right after joining (they donтАЩt force, just ask), which isn't a good practice. You canтАЩt form a real opinion about a company that early тАФ it takes time to understand the culture and environment.- Salary is supposed to be disbursed by the 5th of the following month, which already reflects a poor payment culture. Even then, delays are common, and salaries often take longer than promised.
- They are a4th-party company,they have a client, who themselves are a contractor for another company. This adds unnecessary layers of dependency and instability.
- Employees can be firedwithout any prior notice. Sometimes, you'll find yourself suddenly locked out of all resources тАФ and thatтАЩs how you realize youтАЩve been let go.
- The reasons for termination are often vague тАФ things likelack of experience or communication issues.But in reality, even seniors and leads have been fired without explanation. It feels more like ahire-and-fireculture. Totally an unstable company.
-HR is one of the weakest links. They often donтАЩt have clear answers to basic questions. Everything needs to go through upper management, leading to major communication gaps and delays.
- Most employees spend their days in constant fear of being fired, which leads to health risks and significant mental stress.
- PleasedonтАЩt be swayedby posts promising competitive salaries or internet reimbursements or other perks. If youтАЩre already in a full-time, stable position тАФdonтАЩt risk itby joining this company.
- You might be hired as a backend developer then shifted to complete frontend role, or even across stacks all on a sudden due to their contractors change of mind or sudden requirement!!!!!!- ThereтАЩs no transparency тАФ even when the management knows your job is at risk, theyтАЩll often inform you at the very last moment (if at all).
- ItтАЩs not worth gambling with your career.
Advice to the management:
-Please donтАЩt play with peopleтАЩs careers. Not everyone is a rich, carefree individual. Your company isnтАЩt made up of just a few highly privileged, rich, cool employees. Many of them are the sole earners for their families.
Sudden terminations can cause serious consequences тАФ some people could suffer from extreme mental stress, or even severe health issues. You need to give more attention to stability and job security when hiring. ItтАЩs not a game where one person is fired and another is immediately hired in their place.Try to identify the real problems within the organization and work toward solutions. You started off with a promising culture, but these practices are damaging your reputation and peopleтАЩs lives. Please sort this out тАФ or at the very least, stop hiring and firing people so frequently.

title: DonтАЩt Judge a Company by Its Glossy Branding
content:
From the outside, the company may seem like a beacon of success. With flashy social media posts and self-congratulatory messages, it proudly presents itself as one of the top companies (which obviously isnтАЩt) in the world. But those who have witnessed the internal workings know a harsh truth тАФ itтАЩs all fa├зade on the outside and chaos within.
Disturbing Workplace Rumors & Conflicts of Interest:
It is widely speculated within the office that the CEO is engaged in an inappropriate relationship with the Sales & Marketing Manager тАФ a matter many believe contributed directly to the CEOтАЩs divorce. While this remains internal gossip, the impact on professionalism and workplace dynamics is undeniable. This relationship also results in visible undue privileges for the manager in question, further deepening the inequality.
Severe Mismanagement of Salary Structure:
тАУ The end of each month brings uncertainty, with many employees left waiting until mid-month (or longer) without receiving their salaries.
тАУ For some, salaries remain pending for months.
тАУ The pay scale itself is absurdly misaligned with the workload and responsibility. Employees whose roles merit salaries of 300,000тАУ400,000 BDT are paid less than 100,000 BDT тАФ a staggering disparity.
Absence of Financial Reserves:
тАУ The company operates without any emergency or backup fund.
тАУ This lack of financial planning often leads to delayed salaries and halted operations, even during minor financial stress.
тАУ It raises serious concerns about the long-term sustainability and stability of the organization.
Favoritism Over Meritocracy:
тАУ Hard work holds little value if you are not part of the sycophantic тАЬYes SirтАЭ or тАЬYes BhaiтАЭ club.
тАУ Flattery and personal allegiance often outweigh skill, performance, or dedication in determining career progression.
Lack of Appreciation & Recognition:
тАУ Employees who work tirelessly and go beyond their responsibilities receive little to no recognition.
тАУ Even birthday celebrations reveal the divide тАФ senior or management-level staff receive gifts, while junior employees get nothing, even when both birthdays are celebrated on the same day.
тАУ The culture makes individuals feel replaceable and undervalued, regardless of their contributions.
No Transparency, Excessive Secrecy:
тАУ The management fails to maintain even basic levels of transparency.
тАУ Employees directly involved in projects are often kept in the dark about critical decisions, timelines, or updates.
тАУ Important information is withheld under the pretext of confidentiality, creating confusion, inefficiency, and distrust within teams.
Absence of Formal Policies & Arbitrary Governance:
тАУ There are no written or accessible company policies available to employees.
тАУ No one truly knows what the actual policies are тАФ because they donтАЩt exist in documented form.
тАУ Management imposes whatever seems convenient to them at the time, labeling it тАЬcompany policyтАЭ without justification.
тАУ Employees are expected to comply with unwritten, ever-changing rules that only exist in managementтАЩs minds.
Behavioral Bankruptcy in Management:
тАУ Respect is rare, empathy even rarer. Gossip, blame games, and toxic conversations dominate the leadershipтАЩs tone.
тАУ Management is frequently seen preoccupied with criticizing competitors and spreading negativity about them in the market, rather than focusing on internal growth and integrity.
тАУ Many within leadership lack even the basic understanding of how to communicate respectfully with colleagues.
Neglect of Long-Term Employees, Glorification of the New:
тАУ Those who have served the company loyally for years are often sidelined.
тАУ Meanwhile, newcomers who flatter the right people enjoy undue advantages and benefits тАФ regardless of merit.
Arrogance and Complacency at the Top:
тАУ The management operates with an inflated sense of self-satisfaction, blind to internal dysfunction.
тАУ Constructive feedback is often ignored, and the leadershipтАЩs unwillingness to acknowledge flaws only deepens the rot.
Endnote:
In any workplace, employees deserve not just financial compensation тАФ but respect, fairness, and dignity.

ржЖржорж┐ Craftsmen ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рждрзЗ Senior Software Engineer 2 ржкржЬрж┐рж╢ржирзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржоред ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржПржЗ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржкрзНрж░ржХрзНрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржоржзрзНржпрзЗ ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗржи, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЬрж╛ржирзЗржи, ржПржЗ ржкрзНрж░ржХрзНрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛ржпрж╝ ржХрждржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржзрж╛ржк ржерж╛ржХрзЗ: ржкрзНрж░рж╛ржержорж┐ржХ рж╕рзНржХрзНрж░рж┐ржирж┐ржВ, AWS рж╕рж▓рж┐ржЙрж╢ржи рж╕рж▓ржнрж┐ржВ, ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ рж░рж╛ржЙржирзНржб рзз ржУ рзи, UK(M2A Media) ржЯрж┐ржорзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЯрзЗржХржирж┐ржХрзНржпрж╛рж▓ рж╕рзЗрж╢ржи ржПржмржВ рж╕ржмрж╢рзЗрж╖рзЗ CEO ржЖржЬрж╛ржж рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржмрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗ ржЪрзВржбрж╝рж╛ржирзНржд ржЖрж▓рж╛ржкред
рж╕ржмржЧрзБрж▓рзЛ ржзрж╛ржк рж╕ржлрж▓ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржХрж░рж╛рж░ ржкрж░ ржЪрзВржбрж╝рж╛ржирзНржд ржжрж┐ржирзЗ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж▓рж╛рж░рж┐ ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржирж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЖрж▓рзЛржЪржирж╛ рж╣ржЪрзНржЫрж┐рж▓ CEO ржЖржЬрж╛ржж рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржмрзЗрж░ рж╕рж╛ржерзЗред ржЖржорж┐ рж╢рзБржзрзБ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржЙржжрж╛рж╣рж░ржг ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржЫрж┐рж▓рж╛ржотАФрждрж┐ржирж┐ ржмрж▓рж▓рзЗржи ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ рзнтАУрззрзж% рж╣ржмрзЗ, ржЖржорж┐ ржмрж▓рж▓рж╛ржо ржПржЯрж┐ ржпрзЗржи ржПржХржкрзНрж░ржХрж╛рж░ ржирж┐рж░рзНржзрж╛рж░рж┐ржд ржирж┐ржпрж╝ржо рж╣ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЧрзЗржЫрзЗ ржпрзЗ ржПржХржЬржи ржЗржЮрзНржЬрж┐ржирж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ рзи ржмржЫрж░ ржкрж░рзЗржУ ржПржХржЗ рж╕рзАржорж┐ржд ржЗржиржХрзНрж░рж┐ржорзЗржирзНржЯ ржкрж╛ржмрзЗ, ржпрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЗ рж╕рзЗ ржпржжрж┐ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржмржжрж▓рж╛ржпрж╝, рждрж╛рж╣рж▓рзЗ ржЖрж░ржУ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржЕржлрж╛рж░ ржкрзЗрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рзЗред
ржПржЗ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржХржерж╛рждрзЗржЗ рзз.рзл ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ рж▓ржорзНржмрж╛ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░ржнрж┐ржЙ ржкрзНрж░ржХрзНрж░рж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ ржлрж▓рж╛ржлрж▓ рж╢рзБржирзНржп рж╣ржпрж╝рзЗ ржЧрзЗрж▓редржзржирзНржпржмрж╛ржж ржЖржЬрж╛ржж рж╕рж╛рж╣рзЗржмред ржЖржорж┐ ржмрж┐рж╢рзНржмрж╛рж╕ ржХрж░рж┐тАФрж░рж┐ржЬрж┐ржХ ржПржоржи ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржмрж┐рж╖ржпрж╝, ржпрж╛ ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржп ржирж╛ рж╣рж▓рзЗ, ржЖржкржирж┐ ржпрждржЗ ржЪрзЗрж╖рзНржЯрж╛ ржХрж░рзБржи, рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ рж╣ржмрзЗ ржирж╛редржЖрж░ ржЖрж▓рзНрж▓рж╛рж╣ржЗ рж╕рж░рзНржмрж╢рзНрж░рзЗрж╖рзНржа ржкрж░рж┐ржХрж▓рзНржкржирж╛ржХрж╛рж░рзАред┬аржЖржорж┐ рж╕рзЗржЗ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐ржХрзЗ ржмрж╛ржж ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ ржпрзЗ ржЬрж╛ржпрж╝ржЧрж╛ржпрж╝ ржпрзЛржЧ ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржЫрж┐, рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ржЗ ржЖржорж╛рж░ ржЬржирзНржпрж╕рж░рзНржмрзЛрждрзНрждржо ржУ ржмрж░ржХрждржоржпрж╝ ржЧржирзНрждржмрзНржп рж╣рзЯрзЗржЫрзЗред

title: Toxic and Unprofessional Work Culture
content:
Pros:
Honestly, none worth mentioning based on my experience.
Cons:
Toxic work environmentwith no supportive or collaborative culture.
Employees are treated like propertyafter hiring, not as professionals.
Freshers are expected to perform like senior developerswithout proper guidance.
Management lacks empathyand puts employees under constant pressure.
No structured salary increment policyтАФ promotions and raises are unclear or nonexistent.
Freshers are sometimes threatenedwith salary reductions after being hired.
CEO has used inappropriate language(including slang) when addressing employees, creating a disrespectful atmosphere.
Lack of respectin communication; feedback is often discouraging rather than constructive.
Advice to Management:Treat employees with basic respect and professionalism. Create a structured growth path, maintain transparent policies, and foster a healthier, more positive work environment тАФ starting from the top.

рзк. ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржг рж╣рж╛рзЯрж╛рж░ ржХрж░рзЗ рзк ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп, рзз-рзи ржорж╛рж╕ ржпрзЗрждрзЗ ржирж╛ ржпрзЗрждрзЗржЗ ржлрж╛рзЯрж╛рж░ ржХрж░рзЗ, ржпрж╛ ржЗржирзНржбрж╛рж╕рзНржЯрзНрж░рж┐рждрзЗ рж╕ржжрзНржп ржЖрж╕рж╛ ржПржХржЬржи ржЯрзНрж░рзЗржЗржирж┐рж░ рж╕ржлржЯржУрзЯрзНржпрж╛рж░ ржХрзНржпрж╛рж░рж┐рзЯрж╛рж░рзЗрж░ ржмрж╛рж░рзЛржЯрж╛ ржмрж╛ржЬрж╛рждрзЗ ржпржерзЗрж╖рзНржЯред рждрзЛрж░рж╛ рзк ржЯрж╛ ржорж╛рж╕ ржЗржирзНржЯрж╛рж░рзНржи┬а ржирж╛ рж░рж╛ржЦрждрзЗ ржкрж╛рж░рж▓рзЗ рж╣рж╛рзЯрж╛рж░ ржХрж░рж┐рж╕ ржХрзЗржи?
рзл. рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржПржХржЯрж╛ рж╕рж╛рж░рзНржХрзЗрж▓ ржЖржЫрзЗ, ржЦрзБрж▓ржирж╛рж░, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЫрж╛рзЬрж╛ ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ржжрзЗрж░ ржорж╛ржЭрзЗ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ рж░рж┐рж╕рзЛрж░рзНрж╕ ржмрзЗрж╢рж┐ржжрж┐ржи ржерж╛ржХрзЗ ржирж╛ред
рзм. ржирж╛рж╕рзНрждрж╛ ржЦрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ рж╕ржорзЯ ржПрж╕рзЗ ржжрж╛ржБрзЬрж╛рзЯ ржерж╛ржХржмрзЗ ржЖрж░ ржмрж▓рзЗ рзл ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯ ржЖржЫрзЗ,┬а рзи ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯ ржЖржЫрзЗ, ржпрзЗржирзЛ ржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗ ржЗржЮрзНржЬрж┐ржирж┐рзЯрж╛рж░ ржирж╛, рж╕ржмрж╛ржЗ рж▓рзЗржмрж╛рж░ред
рзн. ржлрзЗрж╕ржмрзБржХрзЗ ржмрж┐ржнрж┐ржирзНржи ржЧрзНрж░рзБржкрзЗ ржПржжрзЗрж░ ржирж╛ржорзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХ ржмрж╛ржЬрзЗ рж░рж┐ржнрж┐ржЙ ржЖрж╕ржЫрзЗ, ржХрж┐ржЫрзБ рж░рж┐ржнрж┐ржЙ ржкрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛рж░ ржЦрж╛ржЯрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржбрж┐рж▓рзЗржЯ ржХрж░рзЗ ржжрж┐ржЫрж┐рж▓рзЛред
рзо. ржЕрж░ржЬрж┐ржирж╛рж▓ рж╕рж╛рж░рзНржЯрж┐ржлрж┐ржХрзЗржЯ ржЖржЯржХрзЗ рж░рзЗржЦрзЗ ржЬрж┐ржорзНржорж┐ ржХрж░рзЗред

title: Asst Manager (ERP development)
content:
Last year I was hired before EID UL FITR. When I was given the confirmation letter it was showing that it was a six months contractual job and if they need more they might extend the contracts.┬а There was a major issue in their transportation module to process more parcels. Also the AGM was involve in their ecommerce who was not able to fix that issues as the exact reason┬а was not find. After analyses the system found reason and fixed that. Besides this the AGM was not able to handle ecommerce team and management reassign him ERP team. EID UL FITR and EID UL ADHA gone smoothly without any interruption. And the interesting thing was happening then the complex thing like IOT integrating task was assign me and completed successfully. Then he give me create document with his standard but he does not have standard document of previously developed or example. From then he started revoking and trying prove that I am unfit. And last he report that I am not suit for them.
The main reason was as he was unable to handle ecommerce and back ERP development team. Management does not want more Senior in the sme team. Inspite of confirming me the AGM does not want me to contue his team.
The inresting things management does not justify my tasks what I have done.┬а ┬аAGM and DGM only allow people in their network. So that their job position will safe.

title: Valueless company ever. Cheap mentality management
content:
1. The company's CEO, Rafi Dowla, has a very low sense of professionalism. His behavior is extremely rude. He humiliates senior employees in front of juniors and even fires junior employees without notice.
2. The companyтАЩs manager, AKM Golam Murshed, would be satisfied if he could make employees work 20 hours a day. During salary increment time, they fool employees with promises of a 13% raise. A blaming and toxic culture has been established in the office so strongly that everyone is terrified of being blamed for mistakes and getting fired.
3. The companyтАЩs frontend lead, Deepita Saha, and backend lead, Plabon Ghosh, have started a family businessтАФbringing in their own family members into the company, showing off, while all the pressure falls on the rest of the employees.
4. They mainly do outsourcing under the name of their sister company "Premise" and operate under the name "Codemen Solutions Limited" just to evade government taxes. In reality, all employees work for Premise. Still, the salary structure is so poorтАФthey start with just 20,000 BDT.

title: рж╕ржлржЯржУржпрж╝рзНржпрж╛рж░ ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ ржирж╛ржорзЗ ржЧрзЛржбрж╛ржЙржи
content:
ржПржЗржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж░ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢ржЦрзБржмржЗржкржХрзНрж╖ржкрж╛рждржорзВрж▓ржХредржХрж┐ржЫрзБржирж┐рж░рзНржжрж┐рж╖рзНржЯржорж╛ржирзБрж╖ржХрзЗржЖржЧрзЗржнрж╛ржЧрзЗржЗржмрзЗржЫрзЗржирзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛рж╣ржпрж╝,рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░рж╕ржмрж╛рж░ржЪрзЗржпрж╝рзЗржЖрж▓рж╛ржжрж╛ржЧрзБрж░рзБрждрзНржмржжрзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛рж╣ржпрж╝редржмрж╕ржжрзЗрж░ржкрж╛рж╢рзЗржмрж╕рж╛рж░ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛,ржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░рж╕ржмржирж┐рж░рзНржжрзЗрж╢ржирж╛ржУрж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧрж╢рзБржзрзБрждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ржЬржирзНржпржЗредржмрж╛ржХрж┐ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ржЖржЫрзЗржи,рждрж╛рж░рж╛ржпрждржЗржоржирзЛржпрзЛржЧржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржХрж╛ржЬржХрж░рзБржиржирж╛ржХрзЗржи,рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ржХрзЗржХрзЗржЙрждрзЗржоржиржЧрзБрж░рзБрждрзНржмржжрзЗржпрж╝ржирж╛ред
ржжрж┐ржирзЗржкрзНрж░рж╛ржпрж╝рзпржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ржПржХржЯрж╛ржирж╛ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗржмрж╕рзЗржерж╛ржХрждрзЗрж╣ржпрж╝редржорж╛ржЭрзЗржоржзрзНржпрзЗржПржХржЯрзБржмрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗржЧрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржжржоржирзЗржУржпрж╝рж╛рж░рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧржУржирзЗржЗредржкрзБрж░рзЛрж╕ржоржпрж╝ржЯрж╛ржПржоржиржнрж╛ржмрзЗржХрж╛ржЯрзЗ,ржпрзЗржиржПржХржЯрж╛ржмржирзНржзржШрж░рзЗрж░ржоржзрзНржпрзЗржорзЗрж╢рж┐ржирзЗрж░ржорждрзЛржХрж╛ржЬржХрж░рзЗржпрзЗрждрзЗрж╣ржЪрзНржЫрзЗредрж╕ржлржЯржУржпрж╝рзНржпрж╛рж░ржХрзЛржорзНржкрж╛ржирж┐рж╣рж▓рзЗржУ,ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрзЗржХрж╛ржЬрзЗрж░ржкрж░рж┐ржмрзЗрж╢рзЗржХрзЛржирзЛржЖржзрзБржирж┐ржХрждрж╛ржмрж╛ржЙржжрзНржнрж╛ржмржирзАрждрж╛ржжрзЗржЦрж╛ржпрж╛ржпрж╝ржирж╛ред
ржпрж╛рж░рж╛рж╢рзЗржЦрж╛рж░ржЬржирзНржпржПрж╕рзЗржЫрзЗ,рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ржЬржирзНржпрж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧржЦрзБржмржЗржХржо тАФржпржжрж┐ржирж╛рждрж╛рж░рж╛рж╕рзЗржЗ "рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржирзНржбржкрж┐ржХржб"ржжрж▓рзЗрж░ржоржзрзНржпрзЗржкржбрж╝рзЗредржЖрж░ржмрзЗрждржи?рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ржПрждржЯрж╛ржЗржХржоржпрзЗржкрж░рж┐рж╢рзНрж░ржорзЗрж░рж╕рж╛ржерзЗржорзЛржЯрзЗржУржорж╛ржирж╛ржирж╕ржЗржиржпрж╝редрж╕ржмржорж┐рж▓рж┐ржпрж╝рзЗ,ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ржЯрж╛рж╣рждрж╛рж╢рж╛ржЬржиржХ тАФржПржЦрж╛ржирзЗржирж┐ржЬрзЗрж░ржпрзЛржЧрзНржпрждрж╛ржжрж┐ржпрж╝рзЗржХрж┐ржЫрзБржХрж░рзЗржжрзЗржЦрж╛ржирзЛрж░рж╕рзБржпрзЛржЧржирзЗржЗржмрж▓рж▓рзЗржЗржЪрж▓рзЗред

title: тЭМ ржЪрж╛ржХрж░рж┐ ржирзЯ, ржпрзЗржи ржзрзИрж░рзНржпрзЗрж░ ржкрж░рзАржХрзНрж╖рж╛
content:
ржмрж╛ржЗрж░рзЗ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржжрзЗржЦрзЗ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗ ржнрж╛ржмрзЗ, ржмрзЬ ржирж╛ржо ржорж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржнрж╛рж▓рзЛ ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐рж╖рзНржарж╛ржиред ржХрж┐ржирзНрждрзБ ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржм ржЕржнрж┐ржЬрзНржЮрждрж╛ ржЬрж╛ржирж▓рзЗ ржЪрзЛржЦ ржЦрзБрж▓рзЗ ржпрж╛ржмрзЗред
ЁЯУНржмрзЗрждржи ржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛рзЯ ржЪрж░ржо ржЕржмрзНржпржмрж╕рзНржерж╛ржкржирж╛:тАУ ржорж╛рж╕ рж╢рзЗрж╖ ржорж╛ржирзЗржЗ ржЕржирж┐рж╢рзНржЪрзЯрждрж╛, рззрзл рждрж╛рж░рж┐ржЦ ржкрзЗрж░рж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЧрзЗрж▓рзЗржУ ржмрзЗрждржирзЗрж░ ржЦржмрж░ ржирзЗржЗредтАУ тАЬржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ ржирзЗржЗтАЭ ржмрж▓рж╛ рж╣рзЯ, ржЕржержЪ ржирждрзБржи ржирж┐рзЯрзЛржЧ ржмрж┐ржЬрзНржЮржкрзНрждрж┐ ржарж┐ржХржЗ ржкрзНрж░ржХрж╛рж╢рж┐ржд рж╣рзЯредтАУ ржХрж╛рж░ржУ ржмрзЗрждржи ржарж┐ржХ рж╕ржорзЯрзЗ, ржХрж╛рж░ржУ ржорж╛рж╕рзЗрж░ ржкрж░ ржорж╛рж╕ ржмрзЗрждржи ржЭрзБрж▓рзЗ ржерж╛ржХрзЗредтАУ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗ рж░рж┐ржЬрж╛ржЗржи ржХрж░рзЗ ржЪрж▓рзЗ ржЧрзЗрж▓рзЗржУ рждрж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржмрж╛ржХрж┐ ржерж╛ржХрж╛ ржмрзЗрждржи ржЖрж░ ржХржЦржирзЛржЗ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛ тАФ ржпрзЗржи ржнрзБрж▓рзЗ ржпрж╛ржУрзЯрж╛ ржПржХржЯрж╛ ржирж╛ржо!
ЁЯУНржкрзБрж░рж╛рждржи ржХрж░рзНржорзАржжрзЗрж░ ржЕржмрж╣рзЗрж▓рж╛, ржирждрзБржиржжрзЗрж░ ржмрж╛рж╣рж╛ржжрзБрж░рж┐:тАУ ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржмржЫрж░рзЗрж░ ржкрж░ ржмржЫрж░ ржкрж░рж┐рж╢рзНрж░ржо ржХрж░рзЗ, рждрж╛рж░рж╛ ржЕржмрж╣рзЗрж▓рж┐рждредтАУ ржЖрж░ ржпрж╛рж░рж╛ ржирждрзБржи, рждрзЛрж╖рж╛ржорзЛржжрж┐ тАФ рждрж╛рж░рж╛ рж╕ржорзЯржорждрзЛ ржмрзЗрждржи ржУ ржмрж╛рзЬрждрж┐ рж╕рзБржмрж┐ржзрж╛ ржкрж╛рзЯред
ЁЯУНржХрж╛ржЬ ржирзЯ, ржЪрж╛ржЯрзБржХрж╛рж░рж┐рждрж╛ржЗ ржПржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржжрзЗрзЯ:тАУ ржкрж░рж┐рж╢рзНрж░ржорзЗрж░ ржХрзЛржирзЛ ржорзВрж▓рзНржп ржирзЗржЗ ржпржжрж┐ ржЖржкржирж┐ ржкрж╛ ржирж╛ ржЪрж╛ржЯрзЗржиредтАУ тАЬрж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБ рж╕рзНржпрж╛рж░тАЭ ржХрзНрж▓рж╛ржмрзЗрж░ рж╕ржжрж╕рзНржп рж╣рж▓рзЗржЗ ржЖржкржирж┐ рж╣рзЯрзЗ ржпрж╛ржи ржоржбрзЗрж▓ ржХрж░рзНржорзАред
ЁЯУНржЕржорж╛ржиржмрж┐ржХ ржУрзЯрж╛рж░рзНржХрж┐ржВ ржХржирзНржбрж┐рж╢ржи:тАУ рзпржЯрж╛ ржерзЗржХрзЗ рж░рж╛ржд рзпржЯрж╛ ржкрж░рзНржпржирзНржд ржХрж╛ржЬ ржпрзЗржи ржирж┐рзЯржо, ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржорзЗржУ ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕рзНржмрзАржХрзГрждрж┐ ржирзЗржЗредтАУ рзи ржжрж┐ржирзЗрж░ ржУржнрж╛рж░ржЯрж╛ржЗржо ржХрж░рж╛рж▓рзЗржУ рзз ржжрж┐ржирзЗрж░ ржЯрж╛ржХрж╛ржУ ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рж╣рзЯ ржирж╛редтАУ рж╕ржкрзНрждрж╛рж╣рзЗ рзи ржжрж┐ржи ржЫрзБржЯрж┐ ржерж╛ржХрж╛рж░ ржХржерж╛, ржмрж╛рж╕рзНрждржмрзЗ рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗрж░ ржЬржирзНржп рж╕рзНржмржкрзНржиред
ЁЯУНржорзНржпрж╛ржирзЗржЬржорзЗржирзНржЯрзЗ ржЖржЪрж░ржгржЧржд ржжрзЗржЙрж▓рж┐рзЯрж╛ржкржирж╛:тАУ рж╕ржорзНржорж╛ржи ржирзЗржЗ, рж╕рж╣рж╛ржирзБржнрзВрждрж┐ ржирзЗржЗ тАФ ржХрзЗржмрж▓ ржирзЗрждрж┐ржмрж╛ржЪржХ ржЧрж╕рж┐ржк ржЖрж░ ржжрзЛрж╖рж╛рж░рзЛржкредтАУ ржХрзЗржоржи ржХрж░рзЗ рж╕рж╣ржХрж░рзНржорзАрж░ рж╕ржЩрзНржЧрзЗ ржХржерж╛ ржмрж▓рждрзЗ рж╣рзЯ, рж╕рзЗржЯрж╛ржЗ ржЬрж╛ржирж╛ ржирзЗржЗ ржЕржирзЗржХрзЗрж░ред

title: ржнрж╛рж▓ ржПрж░ ржерзЗржХрзЗ ржЦрж╛рж░рж╛ржкржЯрж╛ ржмрзЗрж╢рзА, ржоржирзЗ рж╣рзЯ ржмржжрзНржз ржХрж╛рж░рж╛ржЧрж╛рж░ред
content:
рзз.ржШржгрзНржЯрж╛ржнрж┐рждрзНрждрж┐ржХ ржмрзЗрждржитАФ ржЕржлрж┐рж╕рзЗ рззрзж ржорж┐ржирж┐ржЯ ржжрзЗрж░рж┐ ржХрж░рж▓рзЗржЗ ржПржХ ржШржгрзНржЯрж╛рж░ ржмрзЗрждржи ржХрзЗржЯрзЗ ржирзЗржУрзЯрж╛
